loans.name: Parishan

texts.en:
Parishan is a 25-year-old internally displaced person from Bilasuvar region. She is single and lives with her family in a refugee settlement. Her family consists of old parents and three siblings. Her father and mother are retired persons.

She grows fruits and vegetables. She loves her job because it is in her yard and she loves to see the crop and harvests. She grows very healthy natural fruits and vegetables and takes them to the local bazaar for selling. People appreciate Parishan's hard work because she is very diligent, honest and kind towards her clients. Parishan is a very intelligent lady. The natural fruits and vegetables sold to the customers are mainly used in traditional dishes and desserts.

She is planning to expand the business. She needs to buy some fertilizer and new fruit trees. She needs 1,800 AZN. Kiva lenders should support her.

loans.use: to buy some fertilizer and new fruit trees

loans.name: Gulbaniz

texts.en:
Gulbaniz is 33 years old. She is an internally displaced person (IDP). Gulbaniz lives in the Bilasuvar IDP settlement. She is married.

She is involved in raising cattle. She owns dozens of cows. She uses them for both milk and meat purposes. Gulbaniz is a very energetic and hardworking person. She knows that being a successful farmer in the rural area requires more dedication and expertise. To that end she does her best. At this age she works tirelessly. Her energy and dedicated approach makes her different and more preferable. She fattens calves and sells their meat to many clients in the local bazaar. People prefer meat for the traditional foods like kebabs, kufta, etc.

Currently she is planning to expand her business. Gulbaniz wants to buy three calves. In order to buy these calves she needs a 1,700 AZN loan. Kiva lenders should support her.

loans.use: to buy three calves.

loans.name: Gila

texts.en:
Gila, 21, is an international displaced person from the Bilasuvar region. She is single and lives with her parents in a refugee settlement. She grows vegetables and fruit in her family's yard. She has more than five years of experience with this work and she loves this job.

With support of her family, especially her dad, Gila is running quite a successful farming business. Her dad is a teacher but helps her with great passion. To manage the farm, she relies on her siblings for support as well. They help her with watering, cleaning the yard and other related work. The family supports each other very well.

Gila runs the farm with great passion and love because she wants to take care of her aging parents and also prepare for marriage. She also sells natural fruits and vegetables in the local market. In Azerbaijan, there is a great demand for vegetables to make traditional foods like dolma and bozbash and also for fruit for after-dinner desserts.

Gila is currently planning to expand the business. She requires 1,800 Azerbaijani New Manats to buy new fruit trees and fertilizers for vegetables. She hopes that Kiva lenders will support her.

loans.use: to buy new fruit trees and fertilizers for vegetables.

loans.name: Jaime Antonio

texts.es:
Jaime de 62 años de edad, está casado,  su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tuvieron  en común 4 hijos de los cuales tres son de hogares aparte, de Jaime solo dependen su esposa y un hijo.


Jaime es agricultor, y también ganadero, realiza esta actividad desde hace 30 años, aprendió el trabajo de su padre quien desde muy joven le enseñó al cultivo maíz, frijol, maicillo, y  la crianza de ganado.  El trabajo lo tiene a 3 kilómetros de distancia de su casa y el horario de trabajo es de 6 a 7 horas al día.


Este crédito lo necesita para comprar una yunta de bueyes, así podrá transportar sus cultivos hasta su casa.

Sus sueños son seguir trabajando fuerte en lo que le gusta, la agricultora y la ganadería; además espera apoyar a su hijo en los estudios.
texts.en:
Jaime is 62 years old. He is married. His spouse dedicates herself to domestic chores. They have four children together and three of them are in separate households. Only his wife and one child depend on him.

Jaime is a farmer and rancher. He has been in this work for thirty years. He learned the work from his father when he was very young. He learned to grow corn, beans, and sorghum, and cattle breeding. His work takes place about 3 kilometers from his home and the work schedule is from six to seven hours daily.

He needs this loan to buy a team of oxen so he can transport his crops to his house.

His dreams are to continue working hard at what he enjoys doing, agriculture and livestock. He also hopes to support his child in his studies.

loans.use: to buy a team of oxen so he can transport his crops to his house

loans.name: Encarnacion

texts.es:
Encarnación, de 42 años de edad, es agricultor y trabaja en una hacienda, estudio hasta quinto grado, su esposa le ayuda en la agricultura y sus dos hijos estudian.

Encarnación, desde que era muy pequeño su padre le enseño a trabajar en la tierra cultivando maíz y a cuidar animales domésticos como ganado bovino; hoy en día tiene sembrados 14,000 metros cuadrados de maíz y su esposa y sus hijos mayores le ayudan con los cultivos.

Encarnación, necesita el préstamo para comprar dos vacas lecheras, porque con la leche elaboraran lácteos, los cuales serán un ingreso adicional para su familia.

Encarnación, sueña con sacar adelante a sus hijos para que se preparen académicamente y que tengan mejores oportunidades laborales.
texts.en:
Encarnación, age 42, is a farmer, and he works on a farm. He went to school through the fifth grade. His wife helps him with the farming, and their two children go to school. Ever since he was very little his father taught him to work the land growing corn and to care for domestic animals like cows. Now he has 14,000 square meters of corn planted. His wife and his grown children help him with the crops.

Encarnación needs the loan to buy two dairy cows because they will make dairy products with the milk. This will be an additional income for the family.

Encarnación dreams of getting his children ahead so that they are academically prepared and have better work opportunities.

loans.use: to buy two dairy cows.

loans.name: Afsana

texts.en:
Afsana is a 28 years old lady. She is an IDP who lives, at the moment, in the Bilasuvar region which is a settlement for refugee people. Afsana is a newly married person. Her family isn't large. She has a daughter and her husband is a master. He works repairing cars. He is supporting his wife's farming activities. She is taking care of her family and also her elder parents. 

Afsana is a well reputed lady in the local market. At this young age, she has been successful in the local bazaar. She grows some vegetable and fruits. People see her as an honest, intelligent and hard-working lady. Afsana's job is dependent on people who have a high demand for fresh natural fruits and vegetables. There are many traditional dishes which use vegetables like potato, cabbage, tomato and also eggplants. People prepare dolmas, bozbash and other meals with them. 

Afsana is a very hard-working and energetic lady. She wants to become a successful person and to meet the family's needs in a better way. For this, she plans to improve her business. She is planning to buy new seeds and fertilizers. She requires a 1700 AZN loan. 

KIVA lenders should support her.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Luis Antonio

texts.es:
Luis es un hombre de campo con empuje y perseverancia, vive con sus dos hijos y su esposa en una humilde finca en zona rural de Sonson. Durante todo este tiempo ha tenido el valor y coraje de sacar a sus hijos por sus propios medios.

El se gana la vida con la cría y producción de cerdos de engorde, esta actividad la realiza desde hace 1 año con el fin de obtener los recursos suficientes para la manutención de su familia. El trabaja todos los días ya que sus cerdos requieren de aseo, alimentación y monitoreo constante para su correcto desarrollo y posterior venta.

El solicita el préstamo para comprar concentrado y alimento para sus animales, dándole la oportunidad de tener unas crías mejor alimentadas y con mejores condiciones para el consumo.
Sueña con ver a sus hijos como profesionales y con la mejor educación posible.
texts.en:
Luis is a man from the countryside. He is driven and has perseverance. He lives with his two children and his wife on a humble farm in the rural area of Sonson. During all of this time he has had the strength and courage to get his children ahead by his own means.

He earns a living by raising and producing pigs to fatten. He has been engaged in this business activity for one year. He does it in order to get enough resources to support his family. He works every day because his pigs require grooming, food, and constant monitoring in order to develop correctly and to later be sold.

He is requesting the loan to buy concentrated feed for his animals. This will give him the opportunity to have better fed animals with better conditions for consumption.

He dreams of seeing his children as professionals with the best education possible.

loans.use: to buy concentrated feed for his animals.

loans.name: Luz Amparo

texts.es:
Luz es una campesina, nacida en una familia de agricultores y mineros, una familia humilde y trabajadora, a la que le debe todo lo que aprendió sobre las labores del campo, pues gracias a eso, hoy en día se dedica a criar ganado bovino y porcino, actividad que le brinda el sustento para su hogar. 

Ella se encarga de alimentar los animales, insemina a las cerdas para que den crías, atiende los partos, los vacuna y realiza todos los procedimientos que se requieren para un buen cuidado. De esta manera genera todos los ingresos para solventar las necesidades básicas de su casa, donde vive con sus 3 hijos. Su empuje, disciplina, orden y el amor que le tiene a su labor, le permiten siempre encontrar nuevas alternativas para seguir avanzando, por ello, se motiva a solicitar el crédito que destinará para comprar 2 cerdas de cría, construir 2 corrales más y comprar concentrado para alimentar los animales, esto le dará la posibilidad de crecer con su negocio, pues incrementará la producción porcina para la temporada de navidad que se aproxima, donde aumenta la demanda de esta carne, así mejorará los ingresos que recibe y con los que podrá seguir avanzando hacia el cumplimiento de su sueño que es tener una granja con muchos animales, bien organizada donde toda la familia pueda trabajar, dándoles la oportunidad de mejorar la calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Luz is a farmer, born into a family of farmers and miners, a humble and hardworking family, to which she owes everything that she has learned about farm work. Thanks to that today she dedicates herself to raising cattle and pigs, an activity that provides an income for her household.

She is responsible for feeding the animals, for the insemination of sows to produce offspring and assisting in deliveries, in vaccinations, and doing all the procedures required for good care. This is the way she earns all the income to provide the basic needs of her home where she lives with her three children. Her drive, discipline, order and the love she has for her work permits her to always find new ways to get ahead.

She is encouraged to apply for a loan to buy two sows, to build two more pigpens, and to buy feed for the animals. This will give her the possibility of growing her business by increasing the pork production for the approaching Christmas season when the demand for this meat is greater. She can improve her income so she can move forward toward fulfilling her dream of having a well organized farm with many animals where all the family can work, giving them the opportunity of improving their quality of life.

loans.use: to buy two sows, to build two more pigpens, and to buy feed for the animals

loans.name: Jose Rafael

texts.es:
Rafael, de 55 años de edad, es comerciante, vive con su esposa y uno de sus hijos, su esposa se dedica al comercio informal y su hijo le ayuda a trabajar en la agricultura.

Rafael, desde hace 4 años y junto a su esposa se dedica a la elaboración y venta de tortillas, él se levanta a las 5:00 de la mañana para empezar a preparar los materiales para que su esposa haga las tortillas y después que ella termina, él sale en su bicicleta a distribuir las tortillas a todos sus clientes y en ocasiones tiene que trasladarse a más de 1 kilómetro de distancia y por las tardes se dedica a comprar leña para el negocio.

Rafael, necesita el préstamo para comprar 3 sacos de maíz, porque debido a la sequía que acaba de pasar el país, este grano básico se está escaseando y el que quedo lo venden caro. 

Rafael, desea comprar una plancha de gas, para colocar una venta de pupusa por las tardes y ayudar a su hijo para que pueda seguir estudiando, porque por falta de recursos económicos lo dejo de hacer.
texts.en:
Rafael is 55 years old, is a salesman and lives with his wife and one of his children. His wife earns a living in the informal economy and his son helps him work in agriculture.

Along with his wife, for four years he has been earning a living making and selling tortillas. He gets up at 5am to start preparing the ingredients so that his wife can make the tortillas and then after she finishes them, he goes out on his bike selling them to all his customers and sometimes he has to travel over 1km then in the afternoon he buys firewood for the business.

Rafael needs a loan to buy three sacks of corn because due to the drought that has just happened in the country, this basic grain is becoming scarce and what is left is expensive to buy.

Rafael wants to buy a gas grill in order to set up a stuffed tortilla stall for the afternoons and help his son so that he can continue studying because due to a lack of economic resources he stopped this.

loans.use: to buy three sacks of corn.

loans.name: Maria Consuelo Del Socorro

texts.es:
Consuelo, una mujer de 59 años de edad que ha dado toda su vida en beneficio de su familia intentando sacarla  adelante y superando juntos las adversidades que se les han presentado en la vida; gracias a una tienda que con mucho esfuerzo, paciencia y sacrificio logro montar, ha generado los ingresos para el sostenimiento de sus hijos. 
Trabaja sola todos los días durante 12 horas.
Buscando ser la mejor empresa familiar del sector quiere solicitar un crédito para la compra de surtido que le permitan aumentar su inventario como granos y abarrotes.
De esta forma ira superando dificultades como las bajas ventas y la competencia.
Este crédito será la gran oportunidad para consolidarse como la tienda más productiva en la vereda y le dará la oportunidad de cumplir ese sueño que tanto ha anhelado de comprar una vivienda propia.

Apoya a Consuelo con su negocio!
texts.en:
Consuelo is a 59-year-old woman who has given her whole life for the benefit of her family, making an effort to support them. Together, they are overcoming the adversities that have been presented to them in life, and thanks to a store that she was able to open with much effort and sacrifice, she has generated the income for supporting her children. She works alone for 12 hours every day.

Seeking to be the best business in the sector, she wants to request a loan for the purchase of supplies that will allow her to increase her inventory, such as grains and groceries. In this way, she will go on overcoming difficulties such as low sales and competition.

This loan will be the great opportunity for establishing her store as the most productive in the neighborhood, and will give her the opportunity to fulfill that dream to which she has aspired so much--to purchase her own home.

Support Consuelo with her business!

loans.use: to purchase supplies that will allow her to increase her inventory, such as grains and groceries.

loans.name: Carmelo Antonio

texts.es:
Carmelo, a sus 62 años de edad, vive con su esposa.

Hace algunos años se dedicó a criar y comercializar cerdos en sociedad con un amigo pero, luego tomó la decisión de independizarse y realizar la labor por cuenta propia para generar mejores ingresos que le permitieran llevar el sustento a su hogar.

Con el ánimo de estabilizar las finanzas familiares, Carmelo desea seguir luchando y fortalecer su negocio, por ello encuentra en el crédito un apoyo para lograrlo; el dinero lo invertirá en la compra de más lechones, con el fin de aumentar su producción y poder generar mejores utilidades al momento de vender en el mercado; así estará en la capacidad de seguir apoyando a su familia económicamente y podrá brindar una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Carmelo, 62, lives with his wife.
He started raising pigs a few years ago together with a friend, but then decided to strike out on his own in order to increase his income and better support his family.
Carmelo wishes to keep fighting to strengthen his business in order to bring financial stability to his home, and this loan is the perfect way of doing so.
He will use the funds to buy more piglets in order to increase production and have more merchandise to sell at the market.
This will enable him to keep supporting his family and to increase their standard of living.

loans.use: to buy more piglets to increase production.

loans.name: Ruben Dario

texts.es:
Ruben es un campesino reconocido como un excelente trabajador y una persona pujante, que ha luchado incansablemente para sacar adelante a su familia, conformada por su esposa y sus 4 hijos.

A sus 48 años de edad, se dedica a trabajar en labores agrícolas, oficio que aprendió de su padre cuando era joven y, que hoy en día le permite tener sus cultivos de frijol en algunos terrenos propios; cuenta con el apoyo de un empleado al que le paga por jornal, la cosecha que produce es recolectada y vendida en la plaza de mercado del pueblo donde reside. 

El crédito que solicita lo invertirá comprando insumos agrícolas al por mayor (semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, riegos, pesticidas, entre otros), esto le permitirá continuar con su labor agropecuaria, aumentando la producción para tener mayor ganancia a la hora de vender la cosecha, así podrá generar más ingresos.

Ruben manifiesta que su propósito es poder garantizar a su familia una estabilidad económica favorable para que no tengan preocupaciones monetarias, pues desea dar mejor educación a sus hijos y poco a poco mejorar las condiciones de vida y bienestar para disfrutar al lado de sus seres amados.
texts.en:
Ruben, a farmer, is known by all as an excellent worker and a brave man.
He has a wife and four children and fought without respite to improve his family's lot in life.
Ruben is 48 and learned to take care of a farm from his father.
He now grows broad beans on his own land and employs a day labourer.
He sells his harvest at the town's market.
He asks for a loan to buy farm supplies wholesale, such as seeds, manure, fertiliser, irrigation, and pesticides.
This will allow him to keep being a farmer and increase production to profit more from his harvest.
Ruben says that his goal is to bring financial stability to his family so that they do not have to worry about money.
He wants his children to get a better education and he aims to improve the family's living conditions gradually so as to live happily with his loved ones.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies wholesale.

loans.name: Manuel De Jesus

texts.es:
Manuel, de 44 años de edad, está casado, es padre de 4 hijos, 3 de ellos van a la escuela y el más pequeño se queda en casa con su esposa.

Manuel, desde que era muy pequeño su padre le enseño a trabajar en la agricultura; pero después que se casó empezó a trabajar sus propios cultivos y sembró 7,000 metros cuadrados de maíz; pero hoy en día tiene sembrados 14,000 metros cuadrados de maíz y trabaja todos los días en época de invierno.

Manuel, necesita el préstamo para comprar fertilizantes y abono para el cultivo de 14,000 metros cuadrados de maíz.

Manuel, espera ayudar a sus hijos en sus estudios y también mejorar su casa porque está construida de lámina y la quiere construir de bloque.
texts.en:
Manuel, age 44, is married and has four children. Three of them go to school, and the littlest one stays at home with his wife. Ever since he was very little, Manuel's father taught him to work in agriculture. After he got married, he started to work his own crops. He planted 7,000 square meters of corn. Now his has planted 14,000 square meters of corn. He works every day during the winter season.

Manuel needs the loan to buy fertilizers and compost for the 14,0000 square meters of corn that he has planted. Manuel hopes to help his children with their education. He also hopes to improve his house because it is built from sheet metal, and he wants to build it from cement blocks.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and compost for 14,000 square meters of corn.

loans.name: Johana Beatriz

texts.es:
Johana es una joven de 19 años de edad, su grado escolar es de 5ª grado debido a la pobreza su mamá no pudo continuar, desde pequeña se dedicó a trabajar, está soltera y no tiene hijos.

     Johana se dedica a ayudarle a su abuela a cuidar unas vacas y a ordeñar, trabajo que realiza desde hace unos cinco años, y también ha trabajado en la crianza de cerdos, hoy quiere emprender la crianza de pollo, el trabajo lo realiza en todo el día y no tiene descanso  pero así se siente bien pues quiere construir su propio legado.


Johana utilizará el crédito para comprar 100 pollos de engorde y comercializar la carne de los mismos, también comprará 10 quintales de concentrado para alimentarlos.

El sueño más grande de Johana es tener un gran negocio y ser distribuidora de pollos al por mayor.
texts.en:
Johana, 19, studied until the fifth form and was not able to go further because her mother was too poor.
She has been working since a very young age, is single, and has no children.
Johana helps her grandmother take care of her cows and milk them and has been doing so for five years.
She also has experience raising pigs, and now has her own business raising chickens.
She works every day without repose but is happy about it because she knows she is working for her future.
Johana will use the loan to buy 100 chickens to fatten and sell their meat, as well as 10 quintals of concentrated chicken feed.
Johana's greatest dream is to have a big shop and sell chickens wholesale.

loans.use: to buy 100 chickens to feed and sell their meat, as well as concentrated chicken feed.

loans.name: Gloria Margarita

texts.es:
Gloria de 36 años de edad, estudió hasta quinto grado de educación básica, está soltera y aún no tiene hijos, vive con su madre que es ama de casa.


Gloria se dedica al comercio informal, se dedica a esa actividad desde hace 13 años, el trabajo lo aprendió sola ya que en la comunidad no encontró otra forma de ayudar a su mamá especialmente cuando el papá falleció.
El trabajo lo desarrolla en la comunidad vendiendo leche y queso, ella lo compra y lo revende para sacar una ganancia para cubrir gastos en la casa, recorre un promedio de 4 kilómetros al día para vender el producto.



Ella solicita este crédito para aperturar una tienda, comprará materiales para mejorar el local y comprará más queso y leche para vender.

Ella espera que su negocio dé resultados es que su familia se supere.
texts.en:
Gloria, 36, studied until the fifth form. She is single and has no children yet. She lives with her mother, who is a housewife.
Gloria has been a saleswoman since she was 13.
She learned the trade on her own, since there was no other way to help her mother, especially after her father's death.
She sells cheese and milk in her area. She buys these products and resells them and covers household expenses with the profits.
Every day, she covers about 4 kilometres to sell her wares.
She asks for this loan to open a proper shop, renovate it, and buy more merchandise to sell.
She hopes that the shop will be successful and that her family will lead a better life.

loans.use: to open a shop, renovate it, and buy more merchandise to sell.

loans.name: Vicente Alfonso

texts.es: Vicente es un contratista de 59 años, que debido a las necesidades económicas tuvo que encontrar otro oficio para aumentar los ingresos mensuales de su numerosa familia, el otro negocio al que Vicente dedica su tiempo es al alquiler de habitaciones, las cuales están ubicadas en su hogar. Sin embargo, don Vicente quiere seguir aumentando sus ingresos, para lo cual necesita un préstamo que le servirá para terminar una habitación que esta en construcción, y con la cual espera generar más ganancias, no obstante, Vicente no quiere detenerse ahí, le gustaría seguir construyendo mas habitaciones en el futuro, que le permita generar los ingresos suficientes para mantener a su familia y darle una buena educación a sus hijos menores.
texts.en:
Vicente, 59, is a contractor but had to find a second occupation to be able to support his large family.
Thus, Vicente also rents rooms in his house.
He wants to increase his income and thus needs a loan to finish building an extra room, which he intends to rent.
Vicente does not plan on stopping there and would like to keep building rooms to rent.
His goal is to earn enough money to keep supporting his family and to send his youngest children to a good school.

loans.use: to finish building a room in his house.

loans.name: Tamara

texts.en:
Tamara is 22 years old and she is refugee from the Bilasuvar region. She is currently single, but she is planning to get married soon.

Tamara has a large family. She is a is very hard working and diligent lady. She is trying to earn enough income by being a farmer who raises cattle and sheep. In this way, she takes care of her family's needs. She is very energetic and passionate about her job.

There are many people in the local market who respect Tamara for her dedication, honesty and right principles in doing business. She is a well known farmer who does a great job in meeting her customers' needs. She has a small shop where she brings natural meat to sell in the market. In the local market there aren't many people who can provide the real natural meat. Thats why people like buying from Tamara.

People have a preference for traditional food like kufta, bozbash, which consist of mutton or beef, and due to growing demand in the market, Tamara is planning to expand. Currently, she needs a 1,800 AZN loan to buy four calves. Hopefully, Kiva lenders will support her.

loans.use: to buy four calves.

loans.name: Tarlan

texts.en:
Tarlan is 31 years old. She is a very young and passionate person. Tarlan is an IDP from the Bilasuvar refugee settlement. She lives with her family and takes cares of her parents and younger siblings. At this young age she knows that she has great responsibilities.

Tarlan is a farmer and people in her neighborhood call her a young farmer. She grows some wheat. She is very diligent and knows that success requires dedication. Tarlan would like to provide more natural products to people. Being a refugee, and from a region where people are more familiar with farming, gives her an advantage in the local market. She is familiar with the local area people and understands their needs and demands.

In Azerbaijan, people consume a lot of wheat. In the rural areas, people bake their own bread and make pastries and cakes at home. Tarlan has an advantage because people know her as an honest person, who sells natural wheat. Currently, she plans to buy more fertilizers, and for this, she needs a 1,800 AZN loan. Hopefully, Kiva lenders will support her.

loans.use: to buy more fertilizers

loans.name: Maria Elsa

texts.es:
Todos los días María se levanta muy temprano, para ir a su trabajo en el mercado oriental, donde vende verduras, y aunque aún ella no tiene un local propio espera tenerlo pronto, sus tres hijas que aún están en el colegio son su principal motivación, ya que, espera que se gradúen de la secundaria y vayan a la universidad, para aprender una profesión y no tengan que pasar por lo que ella ha pasado. 
Es por tales razón que María solicita un préstamo, para poder comprar más verduras para vender y además diversificar un su negocio con la venta de ropa interior de dama, caballero y niño, los cuales espera vender con mucha facilidad, ya que, se acerca la temporada de la navidad y espera generar más ingresos para cumplir todas sus metas.
texts.en:
Every day, Maria rises very early to go to work in the Eastern Market, where she sells vegetables. And although she still lacks her own stall, she hopes to have one soon. Her three daughters, who are still in school, are her principal motivation. Maria hopes they will graduate from secondary school, attend the university and learn a profession, avoiding having to pass through what she has.

It is for these reasons that Maria is requesting a loan, so that she can purchase more vegetables to sell and, in addition, diversify her business by selling underwear for women, men and children. Maria believes she can sell the merchandise very easily with the Christmas season is approaching. She hopes to generate added income in order to fulfill all her goals.

loans.use: buy more vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Naudith Paola

texts.es:
Mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda y poder ofrecerles una buena educación a sus 2 hijos son las metas que motivan a levantarse y trabajar duramente a la señora Naudith, quien con su negocio de cría de gallinas ponedoras ha logrado ser útil y apoyar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar. 

Naudith buscando ser más competitiva, más prospera frente a la competencia, perdurar en el tiempo, mejorar las ventas, tener mayor existencia en su granja quiere solicitar un crédito para mejorar su galpón y comprar más gallinas ponedoras y tener una producción de huevos más alta y ser una distribuidora a considerar.
texts.en:
To improve her housing conditions and to offer a good education to her 2 children are the goals that motivate Naudith to wake up and work hard.  With her business of raising laying hens she has managed to be useful and to support her husband with household expenses.

Naudith is looking to be more competitive, more prosperous over the competition, to last over time, to improve sales, to have more life on her farm.  She is requesting a loan to improve her barn and purchase more laying hens and have a higher production of eggs and to consider being a distributor.

loans.use: to improve her barn and purchase more laying hens and have a higher egg production

loans.name: Yulieth Paola

texts.es:
Las ganas de salir adelante es lo que motiva a Yulieth de 32 años de edad a trabajar incansablemente en su criadero de cerdos y pollos pues aspira que con este humilde empleo pueda tener una mejor estabilidad económica.

Se ve en la necesidad de solicitar un crédito para la compra de cerdos, alimento, vacunas y vitaminas para los mismos; los cuales criara y engordara para su posterior venta. 

Yulieth está muy motivada con este gran proyecto y espera con ansias la oportunidad de poder progresar.
texts.en:
The desire to get ahead is what motivates Yulieth, 32, to work tirelessly in her business.  She raises pigs and chickens, and hopes that with this small business she can have better financial stability.

Yulieth needs a loan to buy pigs, feed, vaccines, and vitamins for the animals, which she will raise and fatten to later sell.

Yulieth is very motivated by this project, and she is looking forward to being able to make progress with her business.

loans.use: to buy pigs, feed, vaccines, and vitamins

loans.name: Vugar

texts.en:
Vuqar is 19 years old. He lives in the Bilasuvar region with his family. He has just finished high school. He loves helping his family and supports his old parents by visiting them daily and taking care of the farm.

Vugar is a very hardworking person and loves his job as a farmer. He is involved in daily farming activities. He has some cattle and raises small calves in his own yard. He usually fattens them and sells their meat in the local market. He has been doing this for the last two years, but he has gained vast experience from seeing his parents do it for more than 10 years.

People in Azerbaijan prepare traditional foods mostly with meat. A lot of people like to consume meat. Since Vugar knows that the existing demand for meat is high in the local bazaar, he is planning to expand the business a little. To meet the demand, he needs to fatten his calves and buy a few more cows. In order to expand his farming business, he would like to buy two more calves. For this, he needs a 1,200 AZN loan. He hopes that Kiva lenders will show their support.

loans.use: to buy two more calves.

loans.name: Helen

texts.en:
Helen is known in the Western Poblacion area for her sari-sari store (convenience store). She is 50 years old and never gets tired of pushing her chosen business ventures.

Helen is thankful that her financial needs, especially the capitalization of her business, are supported by Paglaum MPC. Recently, she took a loan to restock store with consumable goods such as canned goods, noodles, coffee, milk, sugar, detergent bars and powder, bath soap, drinking soda and others.

loans.use: to restock her store with consumable goods such as canned goods, noodles, coffee, milk, sugar, detergent bars and powder, bath soap, drinking soda and others.

loans.name: Adolfo Ámerico

texts.es:
Adolfo es un agricultor de la comunidad, estudió hasta 6° año de Educación Básica, su compañera de vida se dedica a la atención de una pequeña tienda, la hija todavía no va a la escuela pues está muy pequeña, con Adolfo también vive la mamá que  depende de él.


Adolfo se dedica a la agricultura, desde que ya no estudió se dedicó a este trabajo así como al de la 
 Albañilería, fue aprendiendo poco a poco al andar como ayudante de otros trabajadores,
casi siempre los trabajos los hace dentro de la comunidad, y ahora también tiene un negocio de venta de pan por las tardes, la ruta de venta la realiza en  moto por lo que recorre unos ocho kilómetros diarios.


Él solicita este crédito para comprar abono y aplicar a dos hectáreas de milpa.

El sueño de Adolfo siempre sigue siendo tener a la familia unida, desde ya piensa en el estudio de sus hijos y un nuevo negocio que quiere emprender con su pareja.
texts.en:
Adolfo is a farmer from this community.  He has a 6th grade elementary school education.  His life partner works running a small store, and his daughter does not yet attend school as she is very young.  Adolfo's mother also lives with him and is financially dependent upon him.

Adolfo is a farmer.  Since he did not continue his education, he does this work as well as working in construction, which he learned gradually by working as an assistant for others.  Almost all of his work is done in his community.  

Now he also has another business selling bread in the evenings.  He makes a sales route on his motorcycle, traveling 8 kilometers daily.  

Adolfo is requesting this loan to buy organic fertilizer to apply to his 2 hectares of cornfields.  

Adolfo hopes that he can continue having a united family, and he is also now planning for his children's education and a new business that he would like to launch with his partner.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for his cornfields

loans.name: Zainabo

texts.en:
Zainabo works in farming, specifically growing tomatoes. She has dealt in tomatoes now for 17 years, and has vast experience of this business. For her business, she has bought more land for farming.

She is now faced with the challenge of little capital and loss of soil fertility, plus the cost of expensive pesticides. Because of her desire to buy enough of all farm inputs, Zainabo does not have enough money to buy fertilizers in order to harvest quality tomatoes.

She therefore intends to use the requested loan to buy fertilizers for her tomato garden.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her tomato garden.

loans.name: Luz Eleana

texts.es:
Luz tiene 31 años de edad, es casada. Desde hace 11 años se dedica a prestar servicios de belleza, realizando cortes, cepillados, químicos, manicure y pedicura, trabaja a domicilio o desde su casa. 

Aprendió de esta actividad, gracias a sus familiares que se han desempeñado en esta área durante mucho tiempo, pero ella poco a poco ha ido perfeccionando sus conocimientos y su técnica, pues ha realizado diferentes cursos de belleza. 

Actualmente solicita el crédito como apoyo para comprar muebles de peluquería, silla, espejo, silla de pedicura y una plancha para el cabello, de esta manera podrá adecuar bien su negocio y prestar un mejor servicio a sus clientes, lo que se verá reflejado en el incremento de las ventas y de los ingresos personales. 

Luz sueña con ampliar su negocio, adquirir un local donde pueda generar oportunidades de empleo y así mejorar notablemente su economía y la calidad de vida que merece disfrutar al lado de su esposo.
texts.en:
Luz is 31 years old and she is married. For 11 years, she has been providing beauty services, such as hair cuts, blow outs, coloring etc., manicures, and pedicures. She works at homes, or from her house.

She learned this occupation from her relatives who have been working in this field for a long time, but gradually, she has been perfecting her knowledge and her technique, as she has completed various beauty courses.

Currently, she is requesting a loan to help her purchase salon fixtures, such as a chair, a mirror, a pedicure chair, and a hair iron. In this way, she will be able to equip her business well and provide better service to her customers, which will be reflected in an increase in sales and personal income.

Luz dreams of expanding her business and acquiring a shop where she could generate employment opportunities, and thus significantly improve her finances and the quality of life that she deserves to have, along with her husband.

loans.use: to purchase hair salon fixtures, such as a chair, a mirror, a pedicure chair, and a hair iron.

loans.name: Custodio Manuel

texts.es:
Custodio es un campesino de 57 años de edad que, durante su vida productiva se ha dedicado a la agricultura y la ganadería, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa, de esta manera genera los recursos suficientes para llevar el sustento a su hogar. 

Su perseverancia, empuje, fortaleza y dedicación le han permitido sobrepasar diversos obstáculos que se le han presentado como la falta de capital. 

Sin embargo ha sabido manejar estas crisis y ha salido adelante, motivado por su familia y su labor y, ha encontrado en el crédito una opción de apoyo para hacerlo. 

Por ello, solicita su crédito hará la compra de insumos agrícolas como abonos, riegos, pesticidas, insecticidas, entre otros.

De esta forma podrá mantener sus cultivos en muy buen estado para continuar con su producción.
texts.en:
Custodio is a farmer of 57 years of age who, during his productive life, has been working in agriculture and with livestock.  He has the support of his wife, so they generate sufficient resources to support their home.

His perseverance, drive, strength and dedication have allowed him to overcome various obstacles that he has faced due to the lack of capital.

However, he has handled these crises and has been able to moved forward, motivated by his family and his work.  He has been found in the  loans a support option to do so.

Therefore, he requests a loan to purchase agricultural inputs such as fertilizers, irrigation, pesticides, insecticides, among others.

This way he can keep his crops in good condition to continue production.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural inputs such as fertilizers, irrigation, pesticides, insecticides, among others.

loans.name: María Elsi

texts.es:
María, de 56 años de edad, no estudio, desde muy pequeña tuvo que trabajar y no le quedo tiempo de estudiar, actualmente está acompañada y su pareja trabaja como comerciante porque tiene una pequeña tienda.

María, desde que era una niña trabaja en el mercado lavando platos, barriendo y haciendo otras cosas más, y de esa manera fue como aprendió cómo funciona el negocio en el mercado, luego con una pequeña ayuda de sus padres coloco su propio negocio y actualmente tiene su negocio de venta de pupusas y refrescos.

María, necesita el préstamo para comprar un nuevo local, porque donde lo tiene no hay mucha influencia de personas y las ventas han disminuido.

María, desea cambiar de lugar su negocio, para que sus ventas mejoren y sabe que con la ayuda del crédito lo podrá lograr.
texts.en: María is 56 years old. She didn't study, because she shad to work from early age and didn't have time to study. She has a partner now and her partner works as a merchant running a small store. Since she was a small child, Maria has worked in the market washing dishes, sweeping, and doing other chores. That is how she learned the market trade.  Then,  with her parents help, she started her own small business and now she works selling pupusas and beverages. Maria needs a loan to buy a new local stand, because the one she has now is located in an area that doesn't have a lot of traffic and sales have decreased.  Maria wants to change the location of her business so that her sales improve and she knows that she can achieve this with the help of this loan.

loans.use: To buy a new local stand.

loans.name: Uwani

texts.en:
Uwani is a maize farmer from Kunda village. As a Babban Gona member, Uwani is excited to have access to a trained agronomist and superior inputs that will give her the chance to achieve high yields of up to 8 Metric Tonnes of maize per Hectare of land, 5.5 times higher than the average Nigerian farmer.

Before joining Babban Gona, Uwani would have had to sell her maize at harvest, when the price of maize is at it’s lowest, to meet her immediate cash needs such as food and clothing. As a Babban Gona member Uwani can store the maize she harvests and delay its sale until a period later on in the season when she can obtain the best price for her maize at a premium of up to 37% higher than the market price at harvest.

Thanks to the support from Babban Gona’s marketing services, Uwani no longer feels the pressure to sell her maize at low harvest prices. With the opportunity to earn up to $2000 per Hectare of land, Uwani hopes to realize better yields and plans on using her additional income to buy improved machinery and hire skilled labour.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing, eliminating pressure to sell maize for low prices at harvest.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a 30-year-old single man who left school at an early age in order to help to cover the needs and expenses of his family, which consists of three members. Fifteen years ago he started working in the construction field and specialized in concrete painting. Throughout the years he has gained wide experience in this domain, and he is now well-known in his region for his professional skills.

Mohammad is acquiring a Youth loan from Kiva's field partner, Al Majmoua, in order to develop his business by buying scaffolds, which will facilitate his work and allow him to provide his customers with better service.

Mohammad hopes to expand his business more in the future in order to increase his income and improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to develop his business by buying scaffolds which will facilitate his work.

loans.name: Beduit Antonio

texts.es:
Beduit, de 39 años, ha optado por montar un negocio de jugos cerca a su casa ubicada en el municipio de Sincelejo, en este negocio vende bebidas de varios sabores.

Beduit trabaja todos los días desde las 6 de la mañana hasta la 6 de la tarde, es un hombre muy responsable, juicioso y aplicado con su negocio.

Entre sus sueños más latentes está el poder tener un restaurante en el que ofrezcan distintos tipos de alimentos y puede ofrecer empleos. 

Enfrenta múltiples dificultades como el costo de los insumos, la competencia en el sector y las fuertes lluvias que azotan su puesto de trabajo.

El pide un aliento económico para capitalizar su negocio y comprar insumos naranjas, mangos y demás frutas.

El crédito impactara su vida y su negocio de un modo muy favorable pues podrá cumplir con su sueño y tendrá una mayor variedad de alimentos para ofrecer a sus clientes, además de que de este negocio dependen sus dos hijos.
texts.en: Beduit is 39 years old. He chose to  start a business selling juices close to his home located in the municipality of Sincelejo. He sells beverages of multiple flavors at this location.  Beduit works every day from 6:00a.m. to 6:00 pm. He is a very responsible man, prudent, and committed to his business. Among his most latent dreams is to open a restaurant where he can offer different dishes as well as offer employment. He faces numerous challenges such as supply costs, competition in the area, and the strong rains that hit his workplace. He is asking for economic support to capitalize his business and buy oranges, mangoes, and other fruits.  This loan will have a positive impact in his life and in his business because he will be able to achieve his dream and will have a greater variety of dishes to offer his clients. Besides, his two children depend on this business.

loans.use: To add capital to his business and buy oranges, mangoes, and other fruits.

loans.name: Vicenta

texts.es:
Vicenta es una señora que no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, en la actualidad es madre soltera, tiene 8 hijos y todos viven con ella. 

Vicenta tiene diez años de dedicarse al negocio de compra de leche, la procesa y vende los quesos trabajo que lo realiza todos los días y dos veces por día, de ahí saca la crema,  la cuajada y el requesón, ella debe salir hasta muy lejos a vender el producto y sus hijas son quienes se involucran en el trabajo.


Ella necesita mucho de este crédito para comprar cerdos, criarlos y sacar ganancias al venderlos en un futuro.

Ella sueña con ver crecer a sus hijos, que siempre sean agradecidos y aunque con dificultades los ha formado como personas con valores.
texts.en:
Vicenta is a lady who did not have the opportunity to study.  Today she is a single mother of 8 children and they all live with her.

Vicenta has ten years of being in the business of buying milk, which she processes and sells as cheeses.  She does this kind of work everyday, twice a day.  This is where she draws cream, curd and cottage cheese.  She has to go very far to sell the product and her daughters are the ones who engage in this part of the work.

She needs this loan to purchase pigs and raise them for profit by selling them in the future.

She dreams of seeing her children grow, that they are always grateful and even with the difficulties they have grown with, to grow to be people with values.

loans.use: to purchase pigs and raise them for profit by selling them in the future.

loans.name: Hasan

texts.en:
Hasan is a 49-year-old married father of three. Thirty years ago, he started working in the construction field to cover the needs and expenses of his family. He gained experience in this domain from his father and he is now well-known in his region for his professional skills.

Hasan's income is limited and is not enough to cover any additional expenses, so today he is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to pay his son's university tuition fees. He believes that education will help his son in achieving his dreams and building a decent life.

Hasan hopes to expand his business more in the future to increase his income and improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to pay his son's university tuition fees

loans.name: Samar

texts.en: Samar is a 36 year old Lebanese married woman and mother of three children, all of them still attending school. Her husband represents the main income source in the family to satisfy the requirements of life. Despite the bad financial situation, she is requesting today a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l to pay her children’s educational fees. She said that the loan will surely help her to register them for the coming school year which makes her very happy and optimistic.

loans.use: to pay her children’s educational fees.

loans.name: Les Chérubins Group

texts.fr: Fatuma est commerçante, présidente de la banque villageoise «Les Chérubins», cliente de l’IMF Hekima, veuve, âgée de 53 ans, mère de six enfants qui tous étudient. Elle est vendeuse des œufs dans la rue de la ville depuis 3 ans. Elle va s’approvisionner en cent plaquettes d’œufs. Elle débuta par le premier fonds reçu de ses familiers. Elle souhaite construire une maison, scolariser et nourrir ses enfants. Au final, elle remercie Hekima pour le soutien apporté aux entrepreneurs non bancables
texts.en: Fatuma is a trader and president of the "Les Chérubins" Banc Villageois. A customer of IMF Hekima, she is a 53-year-old widow, who is mother to six children, all of whom are studying. She has been selling eggs in a street in the town for the past three years. She is going to buy 100 packs of eggs. She began her business initially with funds given to her by one of her family members. She would like to build a house and be able to educate and feed her children. Finally she is very grateful to Hekima for the support it provides to entrepreneurs who cannot access bank funding.

loans.use: to stock up with 100 packs of eggs.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is a married woman of five children, four of whom attend school and the other one is still young. She lives her own house that neither has electricity nor piped water.

Mary has operated a charcoal selling business, selling from home to her villages. She faces a major challenge of theft in her business. She dreams of expanding to increase her monthly income.

With the loan of Kes 30,000 ($300 USD), she wants to purchase 25 sacks of charcoal for resale and pay for transport. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to improve her living standards.

loans.use: to purchase 25 sacks of charcoal for resale and pay for transport

loans.name: Wilmer Never

texts.es:
Wilmer inicio la venta de ropa, hace meses atrás, actividad aprendida gracias a un amigo, buscó esta actividad como una alternativa de generar dinero y como joven pujante y emprendedor busca el sustento para sus estudios.

Debido al costo de vida tan alto, Wilmer se ve en la necesidad de generar un mayor volumen de ingresos, es por este motivo que necesita un apoyo económico que la ayude a mejorar la variedad de productos que exhibe y que diariamente ofrece a sus clientes. 
Trabaja solo todos los días durante 10 horas.

Solicita un crédito para la compra de ropa y calzado de moda para vender.
Su principal sueño es poder convertirse en el propietario de un almacén con gran variedad de productos y sabe que está por buen camino de la mano de la Corporación Interactuar.
texts.en:
Wilmer started his business selling clothing several months ago, an occupation he learned thanks to a friend. He saw this as a way of generating some income and as a young, energetic and enterprising person he was looking for a way to support his studies.

Because of the high cost of living, Wilmer needs to generate more income and this is why he needs some financial support which will allow him to improve the variety of merchandise he offers to his customers every day. He works for ten hours every day, by himself. He will use the money from the loan to buy fashionable shoes and clothing to sell.

His main dream is to become the owner of a department store selling many different products, and he knows that he is on his way in the hands of Interactuar.

loans.use: to buy fashionable shoes and clothing to sell.

loans.name: Walter Matias

texts.es:
Walter, un hombre de 57 años de edad lleno de sueños y aspiraciones en su vida, vive en una finca en el municipio de Chinu y se gana la vida con la producción y venta de pollos y huevos.  
Con este trabajo intenta sostener a su familia compuesta por su esposa y 3 hijos.
Es un trabajo que ha venido ejerciendo desde hace aproximadamente 3 años con el fin de salir adelante.

Pide un apoyo económico para la compra de pollos, gallinas ponedoras, alimento y materiales para su galpón.

Con este préstamo podrá tener un negocio más sostenible y consolidado.

Con un préstamo que hagas hoy podrás mejorar la vida y el negocio de Walter!
texts.en:
Walter, a man of 57 years of age, has a life full of dreams and aspirations.  He lives on a farm in the municipality of Chinu and earns a living with the production and sale of chickens and eggs.

With this work he supports his family, which is made up of his wife and 3 children.

This is a job that he has been pursuing for about 3 years in order to get ahead.

He is requesting some financial support for the purchase of young chicks, laying hens, food and materials for their coop.

With this loan he will be able to have a more sustainable and thriving business.

With a loan that you support today you will be able to improve Walter's life and business!.

loans.use: to purchase young chicks, laying hens, food and materials for his coop.

loans.name: Alh. Safayanu

texts.en:
Alhaji Safayanu is a maize farmer and a Babban Gona member. Anticipating a good harvest this season, Alhaji Safayanu has the opportunity to attain yields of up to 8 metric tonnes of maize per hectare of land, which is 5.5 times that of the average Nigerian maize farmer.

Before joining Babban Gona, Alhaji Safayanu would have had to sell his maize at harvest time, a period when maize prices are at their lowest in the market, in order to meet his immediate cash needs such as food and clothing. Thanks to Babban Gona’s support, he can now store his maize and sell it at a future date for up to 37% higher than the market price at harvest time.

As a Babban Gona member, Alhaji Safayanu will benefit from marketing support that could see him generate earnings of up to $2,000 per hectare of land. He is thankful that he now has the opportunity to improve the lives of his children and family, and he looks forward to using his additional earnings to providing employment to members of his community through his farm.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing, which will eliminate the pressure to sell his maize for low prices at harvest time.

loans.name: Semra

texts.en:
Semra is married and a mother of two. She is retired from the municipality. She likes to work and be in communication with people.

After retirement she started selling underwear. With the help of her second loan she will buy bulk quantities of underwear. She wants to open a store on her own.

Her aim is that her children will be well educated.

Translated from Turkish by Maya staff
Semra Hanım evli, iki çocuk annesi. Belediyeden emekli, boş durmayı sevmiyor. Bir şeylerle uğraşmak insanlarla sürekli iletişim halinde bulunmayı seviyor. Emekli olduktan sonra da boş durmamak için iki yıldır iç çamaşırı alıp satıyor. Aldığı ikinci kredi ile iç çamaşırı alıp satmaya devam edecek. Bir iş yeri açmak istiyor. Çocuklarının okuması en büyük amacı.

loans.use: to buy lingerie in bulk to sell.

loans.name: Bariaa

texts.en:
Bariaa is a 30-year-old single lady who found employment nine years ago in order to cover her needs and expenses. She is a hard worker and an ambitious lady who has lots of dreams for her future, but unfortunately her limited salary is depriving her from achieving her dreams.

Today she is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner, Al Majmoua, to visit holy religious places, which she has always dreamed of doing.

loans.use: to visit holy religious places, which she has always dreamed of doing

loans.name: Uhaki Group

texts.fr: Mena est commerçante, présidente du groupe de crédits «Uhaki», cliente de l’IMF Hekima, mariée, âgée de 58 ans, mère de 12 enfants dont 6 étudient et 6 n’étudient plus. Elle est vendeuse des souliers plastics au domicile depuis 3 ans. Elle va s’approvisionner en cent quarante-quatre paires de souliers. Elle commença son business  avec le capital reçu de son ancien métier de couture. Elle souhaite augmenter son capital, scolariser et nourrir ses enfants. Au final, elle remercie Hekima pour le soutien apporté aux entrepreneurs non bancables.
texts.en: Mena is a trader and president of the Uhaki loan group. A customer of IMF Hekima, she is 58 years old, married and mother to 12 children, six of whom are studying while the other six are no longer studying. She has been selling plastic shoes from her home for the past three years and is going to stock up with 144 pairs of shoes. She began her business with capital from her previous activity which was sewing. She would like to increase her capital and be able to educate and feed her children. Finally, she is grateful to Hekima for the support it provides to entrepreneurs who cannot access bank funding.

loans.use: to stock up with 144 pairs of shoes.

loans.name: Zahraa

texts.en:
Zahraa is a 22-year-old single Lebanese woman. She has worked as a private teacher since 2012. She chooses this profession because she feels that she is helping students to get the needed education.

Zahraa has arranged a special room in her house where she receives her students, and she has equipped it with the required materials and supplies. Today she is applying to take a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l. to buy a new laptop and improve her teaching skills.

Zahraa is very optimistic about her future and wishes to accept more students in the coming school season.

loans.use: to buy a new laptop.

loans.name: Mame Saye's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe de 2 membres fait partie du banc villageois qui a été crée en décembre 2012. Il est constitué de femmes du même village et des environs. Elles ont de bonnes relations et s’activent dans le commerce, l’agriculture et l’embouche. Une bonne ambiance anime les réunions de groupe.
MAME SAYE debout à droite de la photo et levant la main gauche est l’emprunteuse vedette, elle  est âgée de 35 ans. Elle est mariée et mère d'une fille et de 5 garçons. Elle s’active dans l’embouche.
Avec le prêt reçu elle compte  acheter  un bœuf à 200 000 FCFA et un bélier à 75 000 FCFA. Avec le reste du prêt elle achète de l’aliment de bétail et les revend au bout de 5 mois d’élevage. 
Les bénéfices vont servir à renforcer son activité d'embouche d'une part, et d'autre part à acheter des fournitures pour ses enfants afin de les aider dans leurs scolarités.
texts.en:
This group of two women belongs to the Banc Villageois which was set up in December 2012; they come from the same village and surroundings. They get on well together and are active in selling, farming and fattening animals. There is a good ambiance in the group meetings.

Mame Saye, who is standing on the right of the photo with her left hand raised, is the star borrower and she is 35 years old. She is married and mother to one girl and five boys. She raises animals, and with the loan she is getting she is planning to by a bull for 200,000 FCFA and a ram for 75,000 FCFA. With the balance of the loan she will buy food for her livestock, which she will resell after raising them for five months. The profits she makes will be used to boost her animal fattening business on the one hand, and on the other to buy school materials for her children.

loans.use: to buy a bull and a ram.

loans.name: Ayman

texts.en:
Ayman is a 23-year-old single man, who worked as a barber until five years ago when he decided to learn his father's construction business and develop his own.
Ayman is a hard working man -- he is responsible for providing construction resources to several engineers to start their projects.
Ayman's business capital is growing slightly, but he needs external financial support to develop it properly, that's why he is requesting a YOUTH loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua. He hopes to purchase more pebbles and sand to develop his business and increase his income.
He hopes that in the future he can buy more tools and develop his business properly.

loans.use: to purchase more pebbles and sand to develop his business and increase his income.

loans.name: Julia

texts.en:
Julia is a 25-year-old student at Kenyatta University in Nairobi, where she is in the 4th year of her degree in Law.

Julia is an ambitious lady who believes that the sky is the limit. She was raised by a single mother who had two other daughters to care for. Julia’s dream to pursue law was inspired by the injustices she saw meted out on single women in a very patriarchal society. Without a husband, there was deemed to be no ‘voice of the family’. As a law student, her aspiration is to see a society which offers equality to all -- regardless of their gender, marital status, race or colour.

Julia strives for the best in all that she does. Her Kiva loan will pay for her final year of tuition fees.

Please help her achieve her dreams by contributing to her loan today.

loans.use: to pay for her final year of university tuition fees.

loans.name: Mehta Hospital

texts.en:
Greetings from Uganda! This is Paul, and he is the director of Mehta Hospital, which is in the rural area of Lugazi and which has the capacity for 500 patients at a time.

Mehta Hospital has requested a loan to cover the cost of installing and maintaining a UV water filtration system to provide clean drinking water for its patients. The clinic does not currently have access to consistent clean drinking water, and installing a water filtration system will therefore save the clinic money in the long-term and provide clean, safe drinking water for the patients. The loan will enable the clinic to purchase a UV water treatment system with a 450 litre tank, which will be big enough to store clean drinking water for the patients every day.

Mehta Hospital will repay their loan from their clinic fees, which they collect daily. Paul ultimately hopes that having access to safe drinking water will improve his patients’ health and well being.

loans.use: to purchase a water filtration system to provide clean drinking water for its patients.

loans.name: Freddy Group

texts.en:
The year 2010 was a year that changed the lives of Priscilla and her two children as her husband (their father) suddenly passed away. A mere housewife had to take the reins and lead her family into an uncertain future and bring back light to the otherwise darkened world of her children. She became the mother and father to these young souls who were now entirely dependent on her for their upkeep.

Since she had a passport, the determined young widow decided to try her hand at cross border trading, crossing to Zambia and Mozambique to buy clothing and materials for resale. The business gave her money for rent, school fees, food and clothing for her children but it did not give her peace of mind. Her friend had a good chicken business and decided to mentor Priscilla and teach her all that she knew about the chicken business. Her altruistic actions did not stop there, she went further and let Priscilla use one of her fowl runs and start a broiler business.

Priscilla quickly mastered the art and started with a small batch of 50 chickens. These sold well, the business grew and she grew her batch to 100 chickens at a time. This business was what Priscilla needed. It allowed her to be by her children’s side guiding and shaping them into young responsible adults. The business also gave her the chance to provide a decent education for her children. Her daughter is writing her O- levels this year and her son is in Form 3 at a good boarding school.

An advertisement on the local television channel was the opportunity forty one year old Priscilla was waiting to hear knock at her door. It introduced her to Thrive Microfinance and linked up her mentor and two other business minded women to form the group Freddy. The group is based in Budiriro, a high density location in Zimbabwe’s capital city, Harare.

Priscilla is specific about how she wants to use her loan. She wants to grow her batch size to two batches of 150 chickens each at different stages as she sees that her market is growing fast. She is also anticipating high sales as the festive season is approaching and it is a time that people eat drink and be merry.

Her future plans are to buy a residential plot to build a home for her children.

loans.use: to increase her production to two batches of 150 chickens each at different stages as she sees that her market is fast growing.

loans.name: Nii Nii Baahi Le Group

texts.en:
Juliana is single and has no children. Her business is selling kenkey and fried fish.

She is industrious, independent and very hard-working. Her business takes place in the western area of Chorkor which has the majority of population.

In the photo, Juliana has a white scarf on her hair, is fair skinned and slim. She lives in a compound house which is made of brick and has all the basic services. The need to improve her income led her to head the Nii Nii Baahi Le group. The businesses of the members are: materials, provisions, food stuffs, rice, Milo, and ingredients.

I started my business because the demand was greater, she commented. The advantage of her business is that she has regular customers. Her disadvantage is the competition. Her dream is to improve her business. She wants to buy more maize, fishes and other Items for more production of kenkey. This is her first loan with ID-Ghana in the 13th year she has been doing this activity.

loans.use: To buy more maize, fishes and other Items for more production of kenkey and fried fishes.

loans.name: María Magdalena

texts.es:
María de 29 años de edad, estudió hasta 3ª grado, hoy en día está acompañada y su pareja se dedica a la agricultura, tiene una hija que aún no asiste a la escuela.


    María trabaja en oficios domésticos y en el cuidado de su familia, y algunas veces apoya al esposo a fertilizar la milpa, antes con sus padres también lo hacía y por lo tanto está acostumbrada a realizar este tipo de trabajo.


Ella necesita el crédito para comprar dos docenas de blusas, seis docenas de licras para mujeres, y ocho docenas de sandalias entre otros, para comercializar.

Su sueño es tener bastantes clientes para vender sus productos.
texts.en:
María is 29 years old and studied up to the 3rd grade. Today she has a domestic partner who is a farmer. She has a daughter who does not yet attend school.

Maria does domestic work and takes care of her family. Sometimes she helps her partner by fertilizing the cornfields which is something she used to do for her parents as well, so she is used to doing this kind of work.

She needs a loan so she can buy two dozen blouses, six dozen pairs of women's tights, and eight dozen pairs of sandals, among other things, to sell.

Her dream is to have enough customers to sell her products to.

loans.use: to buy blouses, tights, sandals, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Charles

texts.en:
Charles is a 26-year-old student at Mount Kenya University. He is in the final year of his degree in Clinical Science.

He is one of 4 children in his family, who are farmers in a rural area of Kenya. Life on the farm for his family is difficult, with very hard work and unreliable income. Charles’s dream is to one day achieve stability and independence through his studies. His ambition is to become a doctor, and to use his skills to serve those in society less fortunate than himself.

A Kiva loan will enable Charles to pay his final year tuition fees and to complete his degree.

Please help him to achieve his dreams by contributing to his loan today.

loans.use: to pay his final year university tuition fees and to complete his degree.

loans.name: Rawya

texts.en:
Rawya is a 47-year-old married mother of five children who started selling clothes from her house to help her husband cover the needs and expenses of their family.
Today, Rawya is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to increase her business merchandise with a new diversified collection of winter clothes to satisfy her customers' needs --she'll use the additional income to pay her children's university tuition fees.
Rawya hopes to expand her business more in the future and open her own clothing shop to increase her income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a new collection of winter clothes to sell in her shop.

loans.name: Doha

texts.en: Doha is a 44-year-old married Lebanese woman and a mother of four children who are all still in school. Her husband is the main income source in the family -- he is a retired soldier in the Lebanese army and also owns a gas station. With the new school year starting, Doha is in need of a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l. to pay for school fees. She is very happy that she will be able to provide a good education for her children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for her children

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en:
Mariam is a 50 year-old Lebanese married woman living with her husband and her four children, one of them is still attending school. Her husband represents the main income source in the family in order to enhance their way of living.

Today, she hopes to help her child with his education. For that reason, she wants to take a loan from Kiva partner vitas s.a.l to pay for the first instalment of his study fees. She will be more than happy to see him graduate and achieve his educational goals.

loans.use: to pay the first instalment of her child's study fees.

loans.name: Mirna

texts.en:
Mirna is a Lebanese married woman. She’s 32 and she lives with her husband and two children who are still in school. Her husband represents the main income source in helping her family meet the needs of life and improving their way of life.

Today, she is requesting a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l. to pay for school stationery and to buy her children books. This is her first loan. She plans to take more Kiva loans in the future and help her children continue their education.

loans.use: to pay for school stationery and to buy her children books for school.

loans.name: Alh. Salisu

texts.en:
Alh. Salisu is a maize farmer and Babban Gona member. Anticipating a good harvest this season, Salisu has the opportunity to attain yields of up to 8 metric tonnes of maize per hectare of land, 5.5 times that of the average Nigerian maize farmer.

Before joining Babban Gona, Salisu would have had to sell his maize at harvest, a period when maize prices are at their lowest in the market, to meet his immediate cash needs such as food and clothing. Thanks to Babban Gona’s support Salisu can store his maize and sell it at a future date for up to 37% higher than the market price at harvest.

As a Babban Gona member, Salisu will benefit from marketing support that could see him generate earnings of up to $2,000 per hectare of land. Salisu is thankful that he now has the opportunity to improve the lives of his children and family and looks forward to using his additional earnings to acquire more land to put into the Babban Gona program.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing, eliminating pressure to sell maize for low prices at harvest

loans.name: Sidi

texts.en:
Sidi is a widowed woman with four children, none of whom attend school. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food.

For the past ten years, she has been operating a coconut selling business, selling to local neighbors. She faces the major challenge of seasonality and the high cost of transportation.

With the KES 20,000 she wants to purchase sacks of coconuts for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of coconuts for resale

loans.name: Wada

texts.en:
Wada is a maize farmer from Jajin Dangana village. As a member of Babban Gona, Wada is excited about the opportunity to become a better farmer. With Babban Gona’s support he has the opportunity to attain yields of up to 8 metric tonnes of maize per hectare of land, 5.5 times the average yield in Nigeria.

Before joining Babban Gona, Wada would have had to sell his maize at harvest, a period when maize prices are at their lowest, to meet his immediate cash needs. With this loan and Babban Gona’s support, Wada can store his maize and sell it in the future for up to 37% higher than the market price at harvest.

Wada is grateful to be part of the Babban Gona family and in the end hopes to use his increased earnings to provide employment to members of his community through his farm.

loans.use: To buy food and clothing, eliminating pressure to sell maize for low prices at harvest

loans.name: Dugu-Yiriwaton Group

texts.fr:
BABA est le monsieur qui tient le mouton sur la photo
BABA est un éleveur de mouton, malien âgé de 54 ans, marié et père de six enfants âgés de 2 à 18 ans dont 4 scolarisés. Sa femme fait l’élevage tout comme lui.
 Il fait l’élevage des moutons il y a plus de 6 ans. Il achète ses moutons dans les marchés de sa localité et il les revend  après engraissement dans les mêmes marchés. Le profit qu’il trouve lui permet de subvenir aux besoins de sa famille. Il fait recourt au RMCR afin d’augmenter le nombre de moutons achetés a une vingtaine sinon plus .
pour devenir un éleveur exportateur et voyager dans les pays voisins pour vendre ses moutons.
texts.en: Baba is the man holding on to the sheep in the photo. He is a Malian man, who raises sheep, and he is 54 years old, married and father to six children, ranging from two to 18 years of age; four of the children are at school. His wife raises animals too. He has been raising sheep for more than six years and buys his sheep in the markets in his town, reselling them in the same markets once he has fattened them up. The profit he makes allows him to provide for his family's needs. He is turning to RMCR in order to increase the number of sheep he buys to 20 or even more, so he can raise and export his animals and travel to neighboring countries to sell them.

loans.use: to buy three sheep costing on average 25,000 FCFA, raise them and resell them six months later.

loans.name: Marwa

texts.en:
Marwa is a 25-year-old single woman who has been providing educational services for three years to cover her living needs and education expenses.
Marwa enjoys teaching -- she's worked as a tutor and for a short time as a school teacher. She's sure that she needs to complete her university degree and graduate to start working in a reputable school.
Marwa's income covers most of her living needs and some of her education expenses. That's why she needs a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua -- to pay for her teaching diploma university education costs.
She hopes that in future she'll continue making this dream come true.

loans.use: to pay for her teaching university costs.

loans.name: Zeineabidin

texts.en:
Zeineabidin is a 20-year-old single Lebanese man living with his family. He cooperates with his father to satisfy and fulfill the family's needs. He works in the construction field for extra money.

Today, he is applying for a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l. to register his sister with the new school year, which makes him very happy.

loans.use: to register his sister with the new school year.

loans.name: Darine

texts.en: Darine is a 35-year-old married woman living with her husband and four children who are all attending school. Her husband represents the main source of income to cover the family needs. Darine works from home as a private teacher to supplement the family income. In order to pay her children’s educational fees, she is requesting a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l. Her only hope is to see them pursuing their education suitably.

loans.use: to pay her children’s educational fees

loans.name: Suheir

texts.en:
Suheir is a 41-year-old married woman living with her husband. She has two school-aged children. Her husband is the main income provider, and he works hard in order to earn enough money to be able to pay their heavy life expenses. As for Suheir, she is only dedicated to her family.

Today, Suheir is requesting a loan from Kiva's partner, Vitas s.a.l, to pay the registration fees for her children. She states that she is very happy and eager to always benefit from a Kiva loan in order to enable her children to continue their education appropriately.

loans.use: to pay the registration fees for her children's education.

loans.name: Noha

texts.en:
Noha is a 36-year-old married, Lebanese woman living with her husband.

In order to help her husband financially, Noha started her own business and opened a clothing and accessories shop in 2008. She sells different clothing designs for women, and she is well known in her town by her talent.

To better develop her work, Noha is requesting a loan from Kiva partner, Vitas s.a.l. She will be utilizing the loan to buy a collection of new clothing for her business with the aim to improve her income by a good percentage and thus enhance her way of living.

loans.use: to buy a collection of new clothing for her business.

loans.name: Andrea Rosario

texts.es:
Andrea es dueña de una pulpería, la cual está ubicada en su hogar y con la que ha logrado mantener a su numerosa familia a lo largo de 20 años, es madre de cinco hijos, de los cuales cuatro son mayores de edad y todos han tenido acceso a la educación, gracias al gigantesco esfuerzo que su madre ha realizado. Cuando inauguró su pulpería hace 20 años, lo hizo con capital propio, ahora la pulpería es un negocio estable y pese a la competencia que suponen los numerosos supermercados que se han instalado a lo largo de toda la ciudad, la miscelánea sigue en pie y generando suficientes ingresos.
El préstamo que Andrea solicita, lo requiere para comprar mercadería variada, debido a que se avecina la temporada navideña de la cual espera obtener buenas ganancias, las cuales encaminarían a Andrea al cumplimiento de sus metas a futuro, que son el mejoramiento y ampliación del local y su hogar.
texts.en:
Andrea has a grocery store at her house. With the store she has managed to support her large family over the course of 20 years. She has five children, and four of them are adults. All of them have had access to an education thanks to the gigantic effort their mother has made. When she started her grocery store 20 years ago, she did it with her own capital. Now the grocery store is a stable business. In spite of the competition posed by numerous supermarkets that have been established through time in all of the city, her neighborhood store is still standing and generating sufficient income.

Andrea needs the requested loan to buy varied merchandise. This is because the Christmas season is approaching, and she hopes to get good earnings. The earnings will lead Andrea towards fulfilling her future goals, which are to improve and expand her place and her home.

loans.use: to buy varied merchandise.

loans.name: Ayman

texts.en:
Ayman, a capable man, was born in the northern part of Jordan in 1992. Single and ‎living with his parents, he is a university student, majoring in accounting, and is well ‎known among friends and fellow students.‎
‎
Ayman lacks sufficient funds to pay his tuition fees, and he is one of the guys who ‎are ambitious guys with willpower, so he did not want to stand still without doing ‎anything. Therefore, he requested a loan to help him pay for his university fees and ‎achieve his dreams. He hopes to be supported.

loans.use: to pay for his university fees.

loans.name: Kabibi

texts.en:
Kabibi is a married woman who owns a house that has piped water but no electricity. Her greatest monthly expense is school fees.
