loans.name: Rosemary

texts.en:
Rosemary is a married woman with five children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Rosemary is 38 years old and has five children who are presently in school.

Rosemary has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 8,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy more fish to sell to her local market.

Rosemary has been in this business for 10 years. She would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell to her local market.

loans.name: Eva

texts.en:
Eva is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with eight children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines and requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy feeds and repair her pigpens.

Eva dreams that one day, She will be able to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feeds and repair her pigpens.

loans.name: Jannett De Los Angeles

texts.es:
Durante 29 años, Jannett ha entrado a aulas de clases, orientando en el campo profesional a niños, adolescentes y jóvenes, para ayudarles a desarrollarse con un buen futuro. A sus 46 años ella es egresada de la carrera de Psicología, porque le encanta ayudar a sociedad. En estos momentos acaba de determinar su servicio social de forma gratuita para poner en práctica lo aprendido.  
Por años Jannett ha querido ejercer profesionalmente en su carrera universitaria, sin embargo, la falta de su título la ha detenido. Por esta razón, ella solicita un préstamo para pagar el título de psicología y así obtener plazas de trabajo donde pueda aportar a la comunidad, pero donde también pueda obtener ingresos económicos. En sus planes está trabajar como psicóloga y así poder desarrollarse como lo que siempre ha soñado.
texts.en:
For 29 years, Jannett has gone into classrooms guiding children, adolescents and youth in professional fields to help them develop a good future. At 46 years old she is graduating from her studies in psychology as she loves to help society. She has just finished determining her volunteer social service to put in practice what she has learned.

For years Jannett has wanted to professionally practice her university major. However the lack of a degree has held her back. For this reason she is requesting a loan to pay for her Psychology degree and this obtain employment where she can give to the community but where she can also obtain economic income.

Her plan is to work as a psychologist and thus be able to develop as she has always dreamed.

loans.use: to pay for her psychology degree.

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.en:
Lourdes is 55 years old and married with four children. For the past ten years she has both raised and sold chickens as well as bought and sold rice to earn an income.

Lourdes has applied for a 4,000 PHP through Kiva's field partner NWTF to buy additional chickens plus feed for them. She works tirelessly to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional chickens plus feed for them.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.en:
Victoria is a 45 yrs of age, separated and has 5 children. She has operated a food business for two years. It is what provides for their daily needs and the source of the education of her children. Two of her children are her assistants in her business

.Victoria plans to expand her business but she need more capital, so she took a new loan to improve it. She purchased a lot of utensils and also she bought some ingredients for her menu to be cooked every day.

Victoria has improved their living through this business, because she earns and she provides for the needs of her children who are now in school.

loans.use: to purchase additional utensils of her food business .

loans.name: Mildy

texts.en:
Mildy is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with three children.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, etc..

She industriously earns additional income through other business ventures like raising pigs.

She successfully paid back her previous loan, and now she has requested an additional loan to further build her business.

Mildy dreams that one day she will be able to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, etc.

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
Gina is a hardworking entrepreneur who for the past ten years has fished to earn a living in the Philippines. She earns extra income by buying and selling rice.

Gina has been operating her business through her own effort and with the help of loans through Kiva's field partner NWTF. She has taken out and successfully repaid a previous loan and has now applied for a 15,000 PHP loan to buy fishing equipment such as nets, wood, bamboo, etc. Her goal is to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fishing equipment such as nets, wood, bamboo, etc.

loans.name: Socorro

texts.en:
Socorro is from the town of Dumanjug, Cebu. She is married and has five children. Her eldest child is 21 and the youngest is 9.

She earns a living by weaving products like handbags and mini boxes made of native buri (palm) leaves. The leaves are dried and sometimes she dyes them with color. She sells her products to the locals in her area.

To support her family, she also engages in a barbecue vending business. She sells chicken and meat barbecue to improve her income.

She is 43 years of age. She continually is seeking ways to become more sustainable and that is why she decided to join CEVI to access loan.

Socorro needs funds to purchase materials like buli and supplies for food vending. These could boost her income and allow her to continue to handle her business properly. This way she can support her family and provide better living conditions for them.

In the future, Socorro is hopeful that she will become productive in her chosen field.

loans.use: to purchase materials like buli (native palm) and supplies for food vending.

loans.name: Nova

texts.en:
Nova is 31 years old and has six children, two of whom are still in school. Nova works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 4,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, noodles, spices, milk, drinks, coffee, snack foods, etc.

Nova has been in this business for five years.

In the future she would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, noodles, spices, milk, drinks, coffee, snack foods, etc.

loans.name: Luciana

texts.es: La señora Luciana es una persona trabajadora de 37 años de edad, de estado civil casada, alcanzo a estudiar hasta la primaria, cuenta con cinco dependientes económicos a su cargo, vive en casa propia, es de construcción rustica con material local a la vez no cuenta con el servicio básico energía eléctrica, el domicilio está ubicado en la comunidad de Kayarani - Tiraque, su actividad económica es la agrícola en tal sentido produce papa, oca y haba en vaina verde, todos los productos mencionados son cultivados aproximadamente en una superficie de 3 has. Los cuales cuentan con riego, ya que es aplicado por inundación. El dinero que tenía anteriormente fue destinado para la compra de dos toros para utilizar como yunta (arado), en ese sentido la señora se ve con una necesidad de solicitar un préstamo para poder comprar semilla de papa y abono orgánico (gallinaza), con la producción en el futuro, con la intención de mejorar  sus ingresos y al mismo tiempo mejorara, una mejor vivencia familiar.
texts.en:
Luciana is a hardworking 37 year old. She is in a common law marriage, and attended elementary school. She has five economic dependents under her care. She lives in a house she owns, constructed of rustic local materials. She does not have basic electrical services. Her home is located in the community of Kayarani, Tiraque. She works in agriculture. She grows potatoes, oca [an andean tuber], and green beans. Each of those products mentioned is grown over a space of approximately 3 hectares, which are watered by flood irrigation.

The money she had previously was used to buy two bulls to use as a plow team. She now seeks a loan she needs to buy potato seed and organic fertilizer (poultry manure) for her future production, with the intention of increasing her earnings, and at the same time, providing a better family experience.

loans.use: to buy potato seed and organic fertilizer to have a better production in the future and increase her earnings for her family.

loans.name: Lucy

texts.en:
Lucy, who is in her mid 40's, is married. She has five children, one of whom is in school. The others are grown. For five years now, she has been running several businesses, such as selling drinks, operating a grain store, and opening a new pub. She works from 8am to 11pm daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be Lucy's eighth loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loan to buy chairs for her pub. She has successfully repaid all of her loans. She is happy and appreciates support from Kiva lenders. She used the profit to pay school fees for her child, to make loan repayments, to reinvest in her business, and to pay for household expenses. She will use this loan to increase her business by promoting her new pub. She dreams of expanding her business to cover each customer's needs.

Lucy will be accountable for repaying the loan.

loans.use: to increase her business by promoting her new pub.

loans.name: Violeta

texts.en:
Violeta, 56, is married and has seven children that she has always worked hard to support. For the past thirty years she has run a general store to earn an income in the Philippines.

Violeta has applied for a 15,000 PHP loan through Kiva's field partner NWTF in order to buy more groceries to sell such as sugar, canned goods and noodles. Her wish is to save enough money to enlarge her store.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell such as sugar, canned goods and noodles.

loans.name: Rosana

texts.en:
Rosana, 44, is married and has four children, all of whom are in school. For the past three years she has worked hard buying and selling rice to make money in the Philippines.

Rosana has applied for a 10,000 PHP loan through Kiva's field partner NWTF to buy more sacks of rice to sell to her customers. Her goal is to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more sacks of rice to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is 50 years old, married with five children, three of whom in school.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, etc. .

Elizabeth has borrowed and paid 3 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 20 years and also earns an income from food vending.

She aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, etc.

loans.name: Sokhom's Group

texts.en:
Sokhom, 41, is a farmer living in a rural area of Tbaung Khmum province and she has two children, one of whom is in school and needs her to support on education. To support her living, she has been selling grocery items as the main source of income for ages. Meanwhile, her husband has been a soldier and growing rubber to get additional income to improve the living as well. Her business is getting not well since the price of grocery items is increased in market, so that she could gain lower profits than before.

Now, she is leading a two-member group to take a loan to save her business and this is the first time for her with VisionFund. For this loan portion, she will use it to buy more grocery items for resale and organic fertilizers to enhance the productivity of crop. She hopes to earn more income and allow her to expand her current business to improve her lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy more grocery items to replenish her store in order to attract more customers.

location.town: Tbaung Khmum Province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Bulus

texts.en:
Bulus is a maize farmer and Babban Gona member. Anticipating a good harvest this season, Bulus has the opportunity to attain yields of up to 8 Metric Tonnes of Maize per Hectare of Land, 5.5 times that of the average Nigerian maize farmer. 

Before joining Babban Gona, Bulus would have had to sell his maize at harvest, a period when maize prices are at their lowest in the market, to meet his immediate cash needs such as food and clothing. Thanks to Babban Gona’s support Bulus can store his maize and sell it at a future date for up to 37% higher than the market price at harvest. 

As a Babban Gona member, Bulus will benefit from marketing support that could see him generate earnings of up to $2000 per hectare of land. Bulus is thankful that he now has the opportunity to improve the life of his children and family and looks forward to using his additional earnings to ensure that all his children get a post secondary education.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing, eliminating pressure to sell maize for low prices at harvest

loans.name: Maricel

texts.en:
As a widowed parent of two children, Maricel works hard to support her family.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Maricel is borrowing PHP 7,000 through NWTF to buy ingredients like meat, fish, pork, spices, cooking oil, and other materials for her food production business.

Maricel has been sustaining her business activities through her past loan from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like meat, fish, pork, spices, cooking oil, and other materials for her food production business.

loans.name: Noring

texts.en:
Noring has four children and works hard running a general store in the Philippines. She also farms rice to earn some extra income.

Noring took out and successfully repaid her previous loan through Kiva's field partner NWTF. She has now applied for a 15,000 PHP loan to buy such items to sell as canned goods and personal care products. She is working to develop her business so as to secure a stable future for her family.

loans.use: to buy such items to sell in her store as canned goods and personal care products.

loans.name: Responsabilidad Ante Todo Group

texts.es: Un grupo conformado por 5 personas responsables a distintas actividades comerciales. Así son los integrantes del grupo comunal. “RESPONSABILIDAD ANTE TODO” una de ellos es el Sra. Alicia de 32 años soltera, se dedica al servicio de confección de ropa todos los días con el mérito de salir adelante. Con su esfuerzo ha logrado mejorar su vivienda y apoyar a su familia. Seguir mejorando su negocio, su mayor deseo es poder tener un taller de confección el cual ayudara a genera más ingresos económicos y así pueda ofrecer más de sus servicios. Con el préstamo otorgado lo invertirá en comprar una máquina de coser, el cual le facilitara mejor calidad en sus productos. A la vez la Sra. Alicia se encuentra parada al lado derecho y se le distingue con una cafarena azul y chaleco negro, se despide con un abrazo a Kiva y Edaprospo. Agradece el crédito brindado ya que hace posible su progreso.
texts.en:
The communal group, "Responsabilidad Ante Todo" is composed of five people who are responsible for different commercial activities. One of them is Señora Alicia, who is 32 years old, and single.

She works every day sewing clothing, with the goal of getting ahead, and with her effort, she has been able to improve her home and support her family. Her great desire is to continue improving her business and to be able to have a dressmaking shop that will help her to generate more income so that she may offer more of her services.

She will invest the loan that she has been granted in purchasing a sewing machine, which will make it easier for her to improve the quality of her goods. Señora Alicia is standing on the right, distinguishable by a blue turtleneck sweater and a black vest. She says goodbye with a hug for Kiva and Edaprospo. She is grateful for the loan that she has been given, as it makes her progess possible.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine.

loans.name: Andrew

texts.en:
Andrew, a hardworking married man living in Fort Portal, Uganda, is a farmer growing bananas, cabbages and tomatoes. He also sells produce as an additional business to earn an income. His major challenges are a lack of capital and a banana bacterial wilt that has affected many farmers, hindering expected returns.

Now working hard toward owning a big plantation growing a greater variety of crops, Andrew has requested this loan to weed and prune his banana plantation.

loans.use: to weed and prune his banana plantation.

loans.name: Swadhin Group

texts.en:
This Group started in the year 2015 at Titlagarh village in Bolangir district, Odisha, India. There are nine active independent women, with the intention of developing their existing businesses as well as their livelihoods. All the members of the concerned group have their own professions and businesses.

Gouri is one of the members who has taken a great role in her development and in the group members’ livelihood improvement. She is standing on the extreme right with her hand raised in the photo. She is about 36 years old and living with her small family: her husband and two children.

Gouri’s husband has been engaged in a clothes business for the last eight years. Gouri is also helping him to promote the business. Through the concerned business, the family earns a monthly income of 7,800 INR. In Gouri’s opinion, with this small income, it is very difficult to maintain the family. After that, to get a sufficient surplus to reinvest in the business is practically impossible. So she formed a group for strengthening social relations and to avail a loan for the expansion of her business.

Gouri planned to purchase a huge quantity of dress materials, sarees and other clothes during the season. As the festival season is coming, Gouri hopes to get more and more profit from her business expansion and save money to provide a better education to her children.

The other eight members of the group are also smart at their professions and also actively engaged in differ professions like vegetable vending, animal trading, grocery shop, tent house, etc.

loans.use: to purchase a huge quantity of dress materials, sarees and other clothes during the season.

loans.name: Megha Group

texts.en:
In the year 2015, nine independent women in Sirol village of Bolangir district, Odisha, India formed a group named Megha. The main objective is to expand their existing businesses and develop their social livelihood by taking a loan from Mahashakti Foundation. Mathura is the most active and energetic lady in the concerned village and has taken the leadership to form a self-help group. The lady is about 26 years old, standing as the second person from the right hand side with her hand raised in the photo. She is a cheerful lady with a high ambition. Her family consists of her husband and two children.

For the last four years, Mathura is engaged in a vegetable vending shop with the help and support of her husband. She earns a monthly income of Rs 5,800 from her occupation. But the present income is not sufficient to manage the business expenses as well as the household expenses of her family. So she decided to raise her income by increasing the volume of her business through the loan. She will purchase a huge quantity of vegetable items like tomatoes, curly flower, cabbage, chilies, potatoes, onions, garlic, zinger, and cucumbers as per the demand of the customers from the nearest market. Through this, Mathura hopes that this will definitely generate a handsome amount of extra income. She has a dream of saving enough for the better education of her children and construction of a good house.

The other eight members of the group are also engaged in different small businesses like vegetable vending, dairy, general store, tailoring, betel shop, animal trading etc.

loans.use: to purchase a huge quantity of vegetable items like tomatoes, curly flowers, chilies, potatoes, onions, garlic, zinger, and cucumbers.

loans.name: Pawel

texts.en: Pawel deals in the salt business and has a super market as well. By doing this, he is able to meet his family needs. However, he is faced with a challenge of weather changes, which greatly affect his salt business. Paul has always wanted to construct a residential house for himself, which he has finally started, but he still lacks some materials to meet his set target of putting his building to the desired level. He is requesting money to buy iron sheets and bags of cement for building his dream house.

loans.use: to buy iron sheets and bags of cement to build his dream house.

loans.name: Alma

texts.en:
Alma is a married woman who has two children, both of whom are currently in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Alma is 31 years old.

Alma has a food vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients like meat, fish, pork, vegetables, spices, cooking oil, and other materials for her food production business.

Alma has been in this business for five years. She would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like meat, fish, pork, vegetables, spices, cooking oil, and other materials for her food production business.

loans.name: Liliana Alexandra

texts.es: Liliana tiene 28 años de edad, es madre soltera de 2 hijos Carlos de 8 años, Mishell de 4 años de edad, estudian en unidades estatales gratuitas hace cinco años se dedica a reparar calzado en un local que alquila  este pequeño  negocio ha sido la fuente de subsistencia para su familia. Liliana con el dinero comprara herramientas, pegante, materia prima por mayor disminuyendo costos  incrementando sus ingresos para alimentar y educar a sus pequeños hijos.
texts.en:
Liliana is 28 years old, and a single mother of two children:  Carlos, who is 8 years old and Mishell, who is 4 .  They both study in free state schools. 

For five years she has been working in the repair of shoes in a stall that she rents.  This small business has been the livelihood source for her family. 

With the money [from the loan] Liliana  will purchase tools, glue, and wholesale raw materials, thus decreasing costs, and increasing her earnings to feed and educate her young children.

loans.use: to purchase tools, glue, raw material.

loans.name: Christopher

texts.en:
Christopher is a 26-year-old single man with one child living in Fort Portal, Uganda. He provides motorcycle transport as his main business, and has been growing bananas and raising pigs since 2013 with the hope of earning income and developing himself.

Christopher hopes in the future to construct a good residential house and rentals that will yield him more income. He is now requesting a loan to help him complete payment on the land where he intends to build the rentals.

loans.use: to complete payment on the land where he intends to build rentals.

loans.name: Hanuman Group

texts.en:
This group was formed in the year 2015 at Kanarla village of Bolangir district, Odisha, India. There are ten active, self-dependent women, with an objective of developing their existing businesses as well as their livelihoods.

Tapaswini is one of them who has taken a great role in her development and her group members' source of revenue improvement. She is standing second from the left with a raised hand in the photo. She is about 34 years old and living with her husband and three children.

Tapaswini and her husband have been engaged with a dairy business for the last eight years. Through this business, they earn a monthly income of 6,300 INR. Tapaswini planned to improve her business in the course of the loan. She will purchase two cows. She hopes to get more income through the expansion of her business. From that, Tapaswini will make a permanent cattle shed.

The other nine members of her group are also smart at their professions and are also actively engaged with different businesses like vegetable vending, grocery shop, tailoring, cloth store, etc. With this loan, they all hope to heighten their livelihoods.

loans.use: to purchase two cows.

loans.name: Amparo Lucia

texts.es: Amparo tiene 44 años de edad es madre soltera tiene 2 hijos Cristian de 18 años y Alexis de 15 años de edad, estudian en unidades educativas del sector , ella empezó a trabajar desde los 15 años vendiendo granizados en las calles de la ciudad poco a poco logro alquilar un puesto en el terminal para ofertar comida preparada todos los días se levanta desde las dos de la mañana a cocinar papas, arroz, verduras, carnes, cafés, aromáticas , este pequeño negocio ha sido la única fuente de ingresos para alimentar y educar a sus hijos .Amparo necesita el dinero para comprar ollas nuevas, arroz y azúcar por quintal ya que por kilos es más costoso obtendría mayores ingresos para seguir cubriendo las necesidades del hogar su mayor aspiración es que sus hijos estudien y se superen.
texts.en:
Amparo is 44 years old. She is a single mother of two children, Cristian who is 18 and Alexis who is 15. They both go to school in the education centers in the area. Amaro began to work at age 15, selling flavored shaved ice in the streets of the city. Little by little she was able to rent a stand in the terminal to sell prepared food. Every day she gets up at two in the morning to cook potatoes, rice, vegetables, meats, and aromatic coffees. This small business has been the only source of income with which to feed and educate her children.

Amaro needs the money to buy new pots, rice, and sugar by the quintal [approximately 100 pounds], as it is more costly by the kilo. She will obtain greater income to continue covering her household expenses. Her greatest aspiration is that her children study and succeed.

loans.use: to buy new pots, rice and sugar by the quintal [approximately 100 pounds].

loans.name: Cesar Augusto

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal LAS MERCEDES DE KATAÑIRAY.
El socio continua dedicándose a brindar el servicio de taxi, el socio lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, él socio es una persona responsable con deseos de poder continuar apoyando a su familia mediante su trabajo, siendo de esta forma que el socio saca adelante a su familia.
El socio solicita el crédito para realizar el mantenimiento de su carro.
El socio se siente agradecido por el crédito y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the "LAS MERCEDES DE KATAÑIRAY" communal bank. He continues working by providing a taxi service. The member has been working in this business for a while, and the business is going well thanks to the effort he puts into it every day. 

The member is a responsible person with wishes to be able to continue supporting his family through his work, which is how he has been helping his family to get by.

The member is requesting a loan to complete maintenance on his car. The member is grateful for the loan and he promises to complete his payments.

loans.use: to complete maintenance on his car.

loans.name: Daniela Tatiana

texts.es: La señora Daniela Tatiana es madre soltera con una hija, aún vive con sus padres (Eliana y Armando) quienes la apoyaron en la diversidad de problemas que fue atravesando con su ex pareja. A pesar de tener apoyo familiar, la señora Daniela desea poder contribuir con algún aporte en efectivo el gran apoyo recibido, motivo por el cual empezó a trabajar de noche para poder adquirir una carrera técnica de su agrado, estudiando en el Instituto Tecnológico INFOCAL pudiendo egresar en la carrera de Gastronomía, actualmente va generando sus propios recursos trabajando con su Ex profesor (Chef), quien realiza variedad de servicios a domicilio para distintos acontecimientos sociales, ella trabaja ya ha ce 4 años como asistente de Cocina I ya tiene bastante experiencia en su rubro y desea independizarse equipando sus herramientas, cuchillo, enseres, ollas a presión, cubiertos, variedad de fundas y otros para repostería, etc., y así poder realizar contratos propios generando así mejores ingresos y poder mejorar la calidad de vida de su hija, familia y su persona.
texts.en: Mrs. Daniela Tatiana is a single mother with a daughter, she still lives with her parents (Eliana and Armando) who supported her through a variety of problems with her ex. Although having family support, Mrs. Daniela wants to contribute some of her own cash in addition to the great support received. Which is why she began to work at night in order to acquire a technical career of her liking, studying to be able to graduate in a culinary profession at the Technological Institute INFOCAL. Currently, she is generating her own income working with her former teacher (Chef), who performs a variety of home services at social events. She has worked for 4 years as an assistant cook and already she has enough experience in her field and she wants to become independent by equipping herself with tools: knives, utensils, pressure cookers, cutlery, a variety of bags and other confectionery equipment, etc... so she can make her own income-generating contracts for higher income and to improve the quality of life for her daughter, family, and her own person.

loans.use: to purchase kitchen equipment and accessories to personally serve her customers and thus generate income for her daughter.

loans.name: Lisseth Carolina

texts.es:
Lisseth es una mujer joven de 26 años, que cuatro años atrás decidió continuar con la profesión de su madre, a quien sustituyó en la elaboración de tortillas, debido a que la señora presenta problemas de salud y ya no está habilitada para laborar debido a su edad.
Siendo madre de un bebé de dos años, Lisseth sabe que tiene que esforzarse y dar lo mejor de sí, para que el negocio prospere y le permita brindarle una vida digna y sin limitaciones a su hijo, es por tal razón que Lisseth ha solicitado un crédito, ya que necesita dinero suficiente para comprar los ingredientes que requiere para la elaboración de las deliciosas tortillas, sin embargo, Lisseth no piensa solo en elaborar tortillas, puesto que en el futuro le gustaría vender productos lácteos y avícolas.
texts.en:
Lisseth is a young woman, 26 years old. Four years ago, she decided to continue in her mother's profession, filling in for her as a tortilla maker. This is because her mother is having health problems and could not work due to her age. 

As a mother of a two year old baby, Lisseth knows that she has to work hard to give her best for her business to grow and prosper, so that she is able to provide her son with a decent life free of limitations. 

For that reason, Lisseth has requested a loan, because she needs sufficient funding to buy the necessary ingredients to make delicious tortillas. Lisseth isn't just thinking about making tortillas. In the future, she would like to sell dairy and poultry products.

loans.use: to buy the ingredients that she needs to create delicious tortillas.

loans.name: Alberto De Jesus

texts.es:
Alberto, de 45 años de edad, estudio hasta séptimo grado, está acompañado y es padre de dos hijos que están estudiando y su pareja se dedica a trabajar en los oficios domésticos.

Alberto, es padre de familia y trabaja en la agricultura y en la crianza de pollos, en esta última actividad le ayuda su pareja y él trabaja en la agricultura desde muy temprano, porque tiene que caminar 1 kilómetro de distancia para poder llegar a sus cultivos.

Alberto, necesita el préstamo para comprar 300 pollos de engorde y para comprar el alimento para ellos.

Alberto, espera ayudar a sus hijos para que estudien y además desea construir una galera más grande para poder criar más pollos.
texts.en:
Alberto, age 45, attended school until the seventh grade. He is common-law-married, and the father of two children who are attending school. His wife devotes herself to the housework.

Alberto is a householder. He works in farming and in raising chickens, his wife helping him with this latter activity. He starts the farm work very early, because he has to walk a distance of one kilometer in order get to his crops.

Alberto needs the loan in order to purchase 300 broiler chickens and the feed for them.

Alberto hopes to help his children so that they may attend school, and in addition, he wants to build a bigger poultry barn in order to raise more chickens.

loans.use: to purchase 300 broiler chickens, and the feed for them.

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
Gina is 33 years old and married, and she has two children who are currently in school.

Gina is in the agricultural business of pig fattening in the Philippines. She has requested a 14,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs. Gina has been in this business for 1 year now, and she has borrowed 2 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Gina would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Jomelyn

texts.en:
Jomelyn is 21 years old and single, and she has one child. She works very hard to provide for her child.

Jomelyn runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a 14,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell, like canned goods, noodles, spices, drinks, cooking oil, bread, snack foods, and shampoo and other personal care products. Jomelyn has been in this business for 1 year.

In the future Jomelyn would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell, like canned goods, noodles, spices, drinks, cooking oil, bread, snack foods, and shampoo and other personal care products.

loans.name: Janet

texts.en:
Janet is a married woman, 51 years old, and she has four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Janet has a tailoring business in the Philippines. She has requested an 8,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional materials like thread, needle, and cloth and to keep up maintenance on her sewing machine.

Janet has been in this business for 15 years. She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional materials like thread, needles, and cloth and to keep up maintenance on her sewing machine.

loans.name: Ma. Luisa

texts.en:
Ma. Luisa is 48 years old and married with three children.

Ma. Luisa works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a 15,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell, like canned goods, noodles, spices, drinks, cooking oil, bread, snack foods, and shampoo and other personal care products.

Ma. Luisa has borrowed and repaid 2 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 1 year and also earns an income from rice retailing.

Ma. Luisa aspires to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell, like canned goods, noodles, spices, drinks, cooking oil, bread, snack foods, and shampoo and other personal care products.

loans.name: Betty Del Carmen

texts.es:
01/10/2016	800000	154927
Con el firme propósito de mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia, de ser independiente y apoyar a su esposo en el sostenimiento del hogar la señora Betty quiere solicitar un préstamo para iniciar un negocio de venta de electrodomésticos.
Este apoyo será muy importante pues esta madre de 4 hijos, de 53 años de edad tendrá la posibilidad de generar sus propios ingresos, generando oportunidades y un futuro más próspero para ella y su familia.
texts.en:
01/10/2016 800000 154927

With the firm purpose of improving the living conditions of her family, being independent, and supporting her husband with the household expenses, Betty is requesting a loan to start a business selling home appliances.

The support will be very important because she is the mother of four children and at 53 years old, she will have the possibility of generating her own income, generating opportunities and a more prosperous future for herself and her family.

loans.use: to start a business selling home appliances.

loans.name: Yorman Andres

texts.es:
Yorman es un joven de 20 años de edad, una persona seria y visionaria, actualmente se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para iniciar un negocio de venta de mercancía como lo son lociones, cosméticos,, productos de belleza y para el hogar. El principal motivo para iniciar el negocio es que busca recursos para pagar su educación universitaria, para ayudar en su hogar, es una persona que desde pequeño le inculcaron el valor de trabajar para alcanzar sus metas y fiel a esa idea quiere montar un negocio para auto sostenerse.
Vamos! Apoya la generación joven colombiana que con trabajo honesto busca salir adelante.
texts.en:
Yorman is 20 years old, a serious and visionary person who is currently requesting a loan to start a business selling merchandise such as lotions, cosmetics and beauty/home products. 

The main reason for starting the business is because he is seeking resources to pay for his university education, and to help at home.

He is a person who since childhood had instilled in him the value of work to achieve his goals.  True to the idea, he would like to start a business to sustain himself.

Come on! support the young Colombian generation, who, with honest work seeks to succeed.

loans.use: to stock up on products such as:  lotions, cosmetics, beauty products and household items.

loans.name: Crissia Magdalena

texts.es:
Crissia estudió hasta el bachillerato, ya que las condiciones económicas no eran suficientes para continuar con los estudios universitarios, está casada y el esposo es empleado en seguridad pública, por el momento no ha procreado hijos, por lo tanto viven solos en casa.


Crissia se dedica a la venta de enchape de oro, plata y acero, ella se dedica a este negocio desde hace cinco años y con el paso del tiempo ella ha descubierto que es un negocio estable y prometedor, el trabajo lo emprendió por iniciativa propia, a ella siempre le ha gustado tener un negocio propio, el trabajo lo realiza en la comunidad de forma ambulante ya que no tiene un local fijo, y lo realiza durante las horas de la tarde.


Crissia necesita el crédito para comprar enchape de oro, plata y joyería de acero para continuar con el negocio de ventas y poder tener más inventario para poder vender y mejorar los ingresos.


El sueño de Crissia es continuar con las ventas, tener un negocio estable y mejorar las condiciones económicas y poder continuar con los estudios en el futuro.
texts.en:
Crissia studied until the end of high school, as she did not have enough money to continue with university studies. She is married, and her husband is employed in public safety. For the moment, they do not have children, so they live alone at home.

Crissia sells gold plated, silver, and stainless steel jewelry. She has been working at this business for five years, and with the passing of time she has discovered that it is stable and promising. She undertook the work at her own initiative, as she has always liked having a business of her own. She works on foot in the community, as she doesn't have a fixed location. She works during the afternoon hours.

Crissia needs the loan to purchase gold plated, silver, and stainless steel jewelry, in order to continue with the sales business, and to be able to have more inventory that she can sell, to improve income.

Crissia's dreams are to continue making sales, have a stable business, improve her economic conditions, and be able to continue studying in the future.

loans.use: to purchase gold plated, silver, and stainless steel jewelry, in order to continue with the business.

loans.name: Mary Ann

texts.en:
Mary Ann is 40 years old and a married woman with four children who are still in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Mary Ann has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She has requested a 5,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more boxes of fish to sell. She has been in this business for 5 years and would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more boxes of fish to sell

loans.name: Lucrecia

texts.es:
Lucrecia, de 54 años de edad, nunca fue a la escuela, porque sus padres no quisieron que estudiara y le exigían que trabajara, a pesar de eso aprendió a leer y escribir en un programa de alfabetización para adultos; ahora está acompañada, su pareja trabaja en la agricultura y haciendo la perforación de pozos artesanales, juntos tienen 6 hijos de los cuales 4 están acompañados y solo dos viven con ellos.

Lucrecia, se dedica a la siembra y comercialización de plátano, este trabajo lo realiza junto a su pareja y lo han hecho desde hace 6 años; pero también se dedican al cultivo de maíz y frijol y a la crianza de cerdos; ella es una mujer emprendedora que le gusta mucho trabajar en diferentes cosas; ya que los padres le enseñaron a trabajar para no depender de los demás, la plantación de plátano la tienen en una parcela cerca de la casa.

Lucrecia, necesita el préstamo para comprar semilla de plátano y fertilizantes para cultivar 3,500 metros cuadrados de plátano. 

Los sueños de Lucrecia, son incrementar la plantación de plátano, para que a su familia no le falten los ingresos y poder tener una mejor condición familiar.
texts.en:
Lucrecia is 54 years old. She never went to school because her parents did not want her to study and they required her to work. In spite of this, she learned to read and write in a literacy program for adults. Now she cohabitates with her partner, who works in agriculture and bores artesian wells. Together, they have 6 children, of which 4 live with their partners and only 2 live with them.

Lucrecia earns a living at planting plantains and bringing them to market. She carries out this work together with her partner. They have done this work for 6 years, but they also earn a living cultivating corn and beans, and breeding pigs. She is an entrepreneurial woman who really likes working on different things. Her parents already taught her to work in order to not depend on others. They have a plantain plantation on a plot near their house.

Lucrecia needs the loan in order to buy plantain seeds and fertilizers to cultivate 3,500 square meters of plantains.

Lucrecia's dreams are to grow her plantain plantation so that her family will not lack income and so that she can have a better family condition.

loans.use: to buy plantain seeds and fertilizers to cultivate 3,500 square meters of plantains.

loans.name: Rufina

texts.en:
Rufina is 55 years old and widowed with five children, two of whom are still in school. Rufina works very hard to provide for them.

Rufina runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a 15,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell, like canned goods, noodles, spices, drinks, cooking oil, bread, snack foods, and shampoo and other personal care products. She has been in this business for 20 years.

In the future, Rufina would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell, like canned goods, noodles, spices, drinks, cooking oil, bread, snack foods, and shampoo and other personal care products.

loans.name: Mario Alberto

texts.es:
La carpintería es la pasión de Mario, cada mueble que sale de su taller ha sido elaborado con el amor y delicadeza de sus manos, sin embargo Mario considera que eso no es necesario, ya que necesita producir más muebles con la misma calidad y en menor tiempo, pero le hace falta el material necesario para lograrlo, es por eso que Mario solicita un préstamo, para comprar materia prima y herramientas de trabajo, que le permitan realizar lo que él desea.
El préstamo sería de mucha ayuda para Mario, ya que al poder comprar lo que necesita, para su negocio, le permitirá mejorar sus ganancias y lo encaminará a cumplir sus metas que son ampliar su taller de trabajo y darle la mejor educación que pueda a su hijo.
texts.en:
Carpentry is Mario's passion. Each piece of furniture that leaves his workshop has been made with love and the delicate touch of his hands. Nevertheless, Mario considers that this is not necessary, since he needs to produce more pieces of furniture with the same quality and in less time, but he lacks the necessary material to achieve this. It is for this reason that Mario is applying for a loan to buy basic materials and work tools that will allow him to achieve what he wants.

The loan will be of great help for Mario, since being able to buy what he needs for his business will allow him to improve his earnings and put him on the road to completing his goals, which are to expand his workshop and to give the best education he can to his son.

loans.use: to buy basic materials and work tools.

loans.name: Dinisa

texts.en:
Dinisa is 27 years old and a very hard working entrepreneur.

Dinisa has a pig fattening business in the Philippines. Dinisa requested a PHP 12000 loan amount through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Dinisa has been in this business for 2 years. In the future, Dinisa would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs

loans.name: Joanna

texts.en:
Joanna is a hardworking woman entrepreneur.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stocks of household goods to sell.

She industriously earns additional income through other business ventures like fishing.

She successfully paid back her previous loan, and now she has requested an additional loan to further build her business.

Joanna dreams that one day she will be able to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of household goods to sell

loans.name: Mary Ann

texts.en:
Mary Ann is 25 years old and a very hard working entrepreneur..

Mary Ann has a pig fattening business in the Philippines. Mary Ann requested a PHP 11000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

Mary Ann has been in this business for 2 years. In the future, Mary Ann would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase feeds and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Abraham

texts.es:
Abraham, de 20 años de edad, estudió hasta cuarto grado, está acompañado desde hace 2 años, su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos y también se dedica al comercio informal y juntos tienen 1 hijo.

Abraham, es un joven emprendedor que se dedica a la albañilería, se ha dedicado a esta actividad desde hace 6 años y este oficio lo aprendió gracias a un tío que le enseño y decidió dedicarse a eso porque le gusta.- Otra actividad que realiza es cultivar maíz y frijol y para llegar a sus cultivos tiene que recorrer 2.5 kilómetros y lo hace a pie y trabaja 5 o 6 horas al día.

Abraham, necesita el préstamo para comprar una yunta de bueyes, para llevar los cultivos hasta su casa, porque está bastante retirado desde donde cultiva hasta su casa. 

Abraham, sueña con seguir trabajando y luchando para sacar a su familia adelante, porque quiere que su hijo estudie e ingrese a la universitaria cuando este más grande.
texts.en:
Abraham, who is 20 years old, studied until fourth grade. He has lived with his partner for 2 years, and she works doing domestic tasks as well as some informal sales. Together they have one son.

Abraham is an enterprising youth who works in masonry. He has worked at this trade for 6 years and he learned this skill thanks to an uncle teaching him, and he decided to dedicate himself to this career because he enjoys it. Another job he works at is cultivating corn and beans and to reach his crops, he has to walk 2.5 kilometers and he works 5 or 6 hours a day.

Abraham needs a loan to purchase a yoke of oxen in order to carry his crops to his home because it is quite far from his crops to his house.

Abraham dreams of continuing working and fighting to help get his family ahead, because he wants his son to study and go to university when he is older.

loans.use: to purchase a yoke of oxen.

loans.name: Ruby Imelda

texts.es:
Ella es Ruby, es una mujer de 36 años de edad, madre de tres hijos, vive en unión libre con su pareja, siempre se ha dedicado a las actividades del hogar, pero ahora debido a la necesidad de generar mejores recursos para apoyar la educación de sus hijos, quiere solicitar un préstamo para iniciar un negocio de venta de productos de la canasta familiar el cual ubicara en su hogar. Con el dinero comprara surtido de productos, víveres, abarrotes, dulces y refrescos, puesto que los activos los compro con unos ahorros que había juntado y con ayuda de su pareja.
Para Ruby será una gran oportunidad en su vida, una que le dará la posibilidad de alcanzar la independencia económica.
texts.en:
Ruby is 36 years old. She is the mother of three children, and she has a common-law marriage with her partner.

She has always devoted herself to housekeeping activities, but now, owing to the need to generate better resources to provide for her children's education, she wants to request a loan to start a business selling basic food basket products. She will locate it in her home. With the money, she will purchase an assortment of products, provisions, groceries, sweets, and soft drinks, as with some savings that she put together and the help of her husband, she purchased the fixtures.

For Ruby, this will be a great opportunity in her life, one that will give her the possibility of achieving economic independence.

loans.use: to purchase an assortment of products, provisions, groceries, sweets, and soft drinks.

loans.name: Cenaida

texts.es:
Ella es Cenaida, mujer de 28 años, campesina, una mujer casera con principios, madre de un pequeño de 5 años de edad que vive en unión libre con su pareja bajo el manto de un humilde pero caluroso hogar.
Actualmente se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para iniciar un negocio, el cual será la cría de aves, puesto que cuenta gran experiencia en la actividad ya que sus padres se la inculcaron desde que era joven. 
Su propósito central es mejorar las condiciones de vivienda, pagar la educación de sus hijos y en un futuro junto con su pareja poder comprar un hogar propio, pero para ello deben  trabajar en equipo, para sacar adelante esa hermosa familia que están conformando.
texts.en:
This is Cenaida. She is a 28-year-old woman, a farmer, a homebody with principles, and the mother of a 5-year-old little one. She lives in a free union with her partner under the guise of a modest but warm home.

She is currently requesting a loan to start a business which will be bird breeding since she has great experience in this business since her parents included her in it since she was young.

Her central purpose is to improve her living conditions, to pay for her children's education, and, in the future, to be able to buy her own home together with her partner. But for this, they should work as a team in order to get ahead as this beautiful family takes shape.

loans.use: to start a bird breeding business.

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en:
Ruth is a married woman with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Ruth is 37 years old and has one child still in school.

Ruth has a buy and sell soft drinks business in the Philippines. Ruth requested a PHP 15000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more boxes of soft drinks to sell.

Ruth has been in this business for 1 year. She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more boxes of soft drinks to sell

loans.name: Anabel

texts.en:
Anabel is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with two children.

She has a nipa roofing business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy raw materials for her nipa roofing business.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business. 

Anabel dreams that one day, She will be able to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for her nipa roofing business.

loans.name: Lucila

texts.en:
Lucila is a married woman with five children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Lucila is 49 years old and has two children who are in school.

Lucila has a general store business in the Philippines. Lucila requested a PHP 11,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy items like canned goods, personal care products, etc. to sell in her general store.

Lucila has been in this business for three years. In the future, Lucila would like to save enough money so she continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items like canned goods, personal care products, etc. to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Rashid

texts.en: Rashid used the previous loan to buy iron rods to mold different shapes to sell. He is still in the same business of blacksmith which he has been doing for 9 years now and he started it with a vision of employing himself. He is mainly faced with hardship of self injury and losses as a result of his customers failing to pay their credit. However, in future, Rashid hopes to establish a hardware shop. Rashid needs a loan to buy iron rods and bars for fabrication.

loans.use: to buy iron rods and bars for fabrication

loans.name: Trang

texts.en: Mrs. Trang is 25 years old. She is married and has a baby, so she works very hard to provide for them. Her family’s income is mainly from salary. She is interested to improve the living standard for her family so she really needs the loan to build a latrine.

loans.use: to build a latrine to improve the health of her family.

loans.name: Lan

texts.en: Mrs. Lan  is 56 years old, married and has one child. She lives in rural area and raising poultry and cattle are her main job, which she has been doing for more than 25 years. The loan can help her to build a sanitatary latrine in order to improve her living standard, especially for her children.

loans.use: to build a latrine to improve the health of her family.

loans.name: Micheal

texts.en: Micheal is a hardworking married man with 2 children living in Fort Portal Uganda. He owns a pub business and and also works as a cobler repairing shoes a business that adds him more income. He faces challenge of theft in his business that make him lag behind. Micheal is looking forward to building a permanent house for his family. He has asked for a loan to help him buy beers for sell in his pub.

loans.use: to buy beer to sell in his pub.

loans.name: John Alfredo

texts.en:
John Alfredo is a 37 yrs old, single and has a pottery business, which is the source of income in his family. He has been managing his business almost 6 yrs and he delivers to his customers everyday.

John is in need of more capital for his pottery business to make his customers satisfied with his services and also he needs an assistant to help him to deliver his products to his customers.

John Alfredo took a new loan to make his business improve and also to buy additional tools for making pottery. John Alfredo improved his living through this business, because he can earn and provide for the needs of his family through this business.

loans.use: to buy additional tools for the pottery making.

loans.name: Jackielyn

texts.en:
Jackielyn is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with five children.

She has a clothing retail in the Philippines and requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy more clothing to sell.

She industriously earns additional income through other business ventures like selling personal care products.

Jackielyn dreams that one day, she will be able to save money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy more clothing to sell.

loans.name: Alfred

texts.en: Alfred is a 32 year old married man living in Fort Portal Uganda. He owns a retail shop selling general merchandise items which he started with a hope of developing himself and his fellow businessmen in town inspired him to start the business. Alfred has future prospects of expanding his business to new areas since his customers describe him as a man of good character. Alfred needs a loan to add stock of cooking oil, biscuits, drinking water and sugar for sale ahead of the Christmas season.

loans.use: to add stock of cooking oil, biscuits, drinking water and sugar for sell.

loans.name: Sam

texts.en: Sam is a 28 year old hardworking married man with 3 children living in Fort Portal Uganda. He deals motorcycle transport the business he operates for 12 hours a day for the last 4 years now. He is facing challenges of weather changes which make roads impassable and destroy his motorcycle leading to constant repairs which is a big expense to him. However, he has future prospects of becoming a wholesaler and buying a car as a taxi for transporting many people. Sam has asked for a loan to buy cement and sand to construct his residential house.

loans.use: to buy cement and sand to construct his residential house.

loans.name: Luz Elena

texts.es:
Ella es Luz Elena, una mujer de 33 años de edad, dedicada a la confección a terceros, genera 4 empleos, felizmente casada, trabaja todos los días con mucho esmero quiere consolidar un grupo de trabajo sólido y permanente en el tiempo, que le ayuden a crecer como empresa y como persona.
Gracias a la puntualidad en las entregas, a su excelente calidad de trabajo, a su personalidad, Luz Elena ha tenido más oportunidades laborales y quiere aprovechar esta enrome oportunidad de progreso que el futuro a puesto en sus manos, por ello pide ayuda para comprar una máquina plana con la cual poder abarcar todos los pedidos que tendrá y de paso generar un empleo.
texts.en:
This is Luz Elena, a 33 year old woman who works as a third party manufacturer. She has 4 employees and is happily married. She works everyday with a lot of care and would like to consolidate a stable and permanent work group in time, which would help her grow as a business and as a person.

Thanks to the punctuality of the orders and her excellent quality of work, as well as her personality, Luz Elena has had more work opportunities and she wants to take advantage of this enormous opportunity for progress that the future has placed in her hands. For this reason, she is requesting help to purchase a sewing machine which will allow her to fulfill all the orders she will have and in turn, hire another employee.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine which will allow her to fulfill all of her orders.

loans.name: Mercedes Cecilia

texts.es:
Mercedes, de 23 años de edad, estudio hasta tercer grado, está acompañada desde los 18 años de edad, tuvo una niña y hoy es madre soltera, porque se separó de su pareja y ahora vive en casa de sus padres. 

Mercedes, trabaja como empleada doméstica para una familia en la misma comunidad, este trabajo lo realiza desde que se separó de su pareja hace dos años, ella necesitaba generar sus propios ingresos para cubrir las necesidades de su hija; el lugar donde trabaja está a dos cuadras de la casa de sus padres y su horario de trabajo es de 7:00 a.m. a 5:00 p.m.  

Mercedes, necesita el préstamo para comprar una ternera, para que crezca y se convierta en vaca y extraer la leche para la alimentación de su familia y también para generar ingresos de la venta de leche. 

El sueño más grande de Mercedes, es tener su propia casa, porque sus padres le darán un terreno.
texts.en:
Mercedes, age 23, studied until third grade. She had been living with her partner since she was 18 years old, and she had a little girl. Today she is a single mother because she separated from her partner, and now she lives in her parents' house.

Mercedes works as a domestic employee for a family in the same community. She has done this work since she separated from her partner two years ago, as she needed to generate her own income in order to cover her daughter's necessities. The place in which she works is two blocks from her parent's house, and her work schedule is from 7:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m.

Mercedes needs the loan to purchase a calf, so that she may raise it to become a cow that she can milk to feed her family, and also to generate income from selling the milk.

Mercedes' biggest dream is to have her own house, because her parents will give her a plot of land.

loans.use: to purchase a calf.

loans.name: Oscar Leon

texts.es:
Él es Oscar un orgullo agricultor de 38 años de edad, una persona pujante, honorable, honrada, que trabaja diariamente en su cultivo de pepinos, con el objetivo de generar los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de sus seres amados.
Para Oscar no hay nada más importante que su familia, por ello el sostenimiento de su terreno es tan importante pues de este depende para generar el dinero para comer y pagar sus cuentas.
Hoy en día se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para iniciar un nuevo cultivo, el dinero será invertido en la compra de semillas de pepinos, abonos, venenos, dicho préstamo ayudara a expandir sus terrenos, generar mayores ingresos a futuro y seguir en pie con su gran sueño que es comprar una vivienda fruto de su propio trabajo y no de una herencia.
texts.en:
This is Oscar, a proud farmer of 38 years of age, a thriving, honorable, and honest person who works every day in his cucumber planting with the goal of generating the income necessary for the sustenance of his loved ones.

For Oscar, there is nothing more important than his family. Thus the maintenance of his land is so important, since he depends on this to generate the money to eat and to pay his bills.

Now he is applying for a loan to begin a new planting. The money will be invested in the purchase of cucumber seeds, compost, and poisons. This loan will help to expand his lands, generate greater income in the future, and continue toward his great dream, which is to buy a house as a result of his own work and not as an inheritance.

loans.use: to begin a new cucumber crop.

loans.name: Ortencia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal LAS MERCEDES DE KATAÑIRAY,el banco esta ubicad en el distrito de Cusco, provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia continua con su negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia es una mujer emprendedora que espera obtener más ganancias para de esta forma poder continuar apoyando a su familia, la socia continua vendiendo  diferentes tipos de productos como arroz, azúcar, leche, golosinas entre otros, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de arroz, leche entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank Las Mercedes de Katañiray, which is located in the district of Cusco, province of Cusco, and department of Cusco.  She continues to run her grocery store business, which has been going well thanks to the determination she puts into it every day.  She is an entrepreneurial woman who hopes to increase her profits so she can keep supporting her family.  

She continues to sell different types of products such as rice, sugar, milk, candy, and others to provide for her family.  The member has requested this loan to buy rice, milk, and other products.  She feels grateful for the loan granted and promises to follow through with her installment payments.

loans.use: to buy rice, milk, and other products.

loans.name: Tho

texts.en: Mrs. Tho is a hardworking woman, 49 years old. She is married and has one child. Her family’s income is mainly from animal husbandry and cultivation. She would like to take the loan to build a latrine, which can help to improve the health of her family. With support from her husband, she is able to repay the loan monthly.

loans.use: to build a latrine to improve the health of her family.

loans.name: Safari Group

texts.fr: Anastasie est commerçante, présidente d’une plateforme de crédits «Safari», cliente de l’IMF Hekima, mariée, âgée de 42 ans, mère de 4 enfants dont 3 mariés et 1 qui étudie. Elle est vendeuse des matériaux de construction dans une quincaillerie de la ville depuis son jeune âge. Elle va s’approvisionner en fer à béton, clous et triplex. Elle débuta par le premier fonds reçu de ses parents. Elle souhaite augmenter le capital, scolariser et nourrir son enfant. Au final, elle remercie Hekima pour le soutien apporté aux entrepreneurs non bancables.
texts.en: Anastasie is a retailer, the president of the "Safari" credit group, and a client of Hekima.  She is married, 42 years old, and the mother of four children (three of whom are already married while the youngest is still a student).  She has been reselling construction supplies in a local hardware store since her youth.  She will use her loan to buy steel reinforcement bars, nails and triplex wires.  She started her business with an initial capital received from her parents.  Her goal is to increase her capital and to continue to feed and educate her (youngest) child.  She is thankful to Hekima for the support they provide to entrepreneurs who are excluded from the traditional banking system.

loans.use: to buy steel reinforcement bars, nails and triplex wires.

loans.name: Lam

texts.en: Mrs. Lam is 25 years old, married and has two children, who are in school. She works very hard to feed and educate her children. She would like to improve her family’s living standard, especially her children but lacks the capital to do so. The loan can help her to build a sanitation latrine and she will repay the loan with earnings from poultry farming.

loans.use: To build a latrine to improve the health of her family

loans.name: Nuevo Amanecer Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “NUEVO AMANECER” iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal Santiago II, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Willma es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de carne de pollo, venta de regalos, venta de papa, venta de refrescos, venta de ropa.
 
El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Willma es integrante, ella indica que integra Pro Mujer por la invitación de una amiga que es cliente de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de refrescos; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió de la familia de su esposo hace varios años.

El crédito que ahora sacará será  para el aumento de capital (compra de refrescos y vasos por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente lo comercializara en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella es soltera y tiene dos hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la capacitación que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
"Nuevo Amanecer" ["New Dawn"] communal bank will begin its first cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Centro Focal Santiago II. It is comprised of 8 members and it is led by a board of directors, where Ms. Wilma is the President. The businesses that the communal bank members carry forward are varied among them. They are: chicken sales, gift sales, potato sales, soda sales, and clothing sales.

The loan they take out will benefit small micro-entrepreneurs where Ms. Wilma is a member. She points out that she joined Pro Mujer through an invitation from a friend who is a client of the institution. She currently has a business selling sodas. She states that she learned this business from her husband's family a few years ago.

The loan that she will take out now will be to increase her capital (to buy wholesale sodas and glasses) that she will acquire from the wholesale vendors in El Alto city and will subsequently sell in her sales space. This form of work allows her to generate resources to economically support her family since she is single and has 2 children.

When she is asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she responds that she likes the trainings the institution offers.

loans.use: to buy wholesale sodas and glasses.

loans.name: Irene

texts.en:
Irene is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with three children.

She has a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

She industriously earns additional income through other business ventures like general store business.

Irene dreams that one day, She will be able to save money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of personal care products so as to expand her business and income

loans.name: Yuleiby

texts.es:
Ella es Yuleiby una joven de tan solo 22 años de edad, la cual se encuentra superando una difícil situación la cual fue perder a su esposo, se dedica a atender una cafetería, pues ahora es cabeza de familia y está a cargo de las obligaciones financieras del hogar.
A pesar de los momentos vividos a tan corta edad, ella es una mujer de grna fortaleza mental y que busca salir adelante, comprar una vivienda y educarse profesionalmente.
Actualmente quiere solicitar un apoyo económico para realizar una reforma locativa, que será organizar la cocina, pensando en mejorar la operatividad en este que es el principal sitió de trabajo,
Este préstamo ayudara a mejorar sus ventas, la producción de alimentos, los tiempos de producción, ser competitivo y poder atender un mayor número de clientes en menor tiempo.
texts.en:
This is Yuleiby, a young woman of only 22 years of age, who is overcoming a difficult situation, which was losing her husband. She tends a cafeteria, since now she is the head of a family and is responsible for the financial obligations of the household.

In spite of the times she has experienced at such a young age, she is a woman of great mental fortitude who seeks to get ahead, to buy a house, and to educate herself professionally.

Now she wants to apply for economic support to improve the facilities, which will be [used] to organize the kitchen, [as she is] thinking of improving the effectiveness in this [area], which is the principal work site.

This loan will help to improve her sales, the production of food, and the production time, to be competitive, and to be able to serve a greater number of customers in less time.

loans.use: to organize the kitchen of her cafeteria.

loans.name: Sarin

texts.en:
Sarin, 42, is a farmer living in a one bed-room house located in Kampong Speu province and she is a mother of two children, who are all still in school. The primary source of her income is from growing rice for ages. She can earn more income via working as a tailor and charging batteries. Her daily income is getting lower, since her rice crop did grow so well. She can earn income only about 6USD per day and be able to save around 3USD each day.

For Sarin, she has been with VisionFund for eleven cycles already and she repaid those loans successfully. She improved her living condition from her previous loans. She is now applying for this new loan to pay the college fees for her son who pursues his bachelor degree in English Literature at the Royal University of Phnom Penh, Cambodia. She hopes this loan will help her son to have a better chance for a higher paid job in the future.

loans.use: to pay fees for her son who pursues his bachelor degree in English Literature.

location.town: Kampong Speu Province, Ou Dong District

loans.name: Tom

texts.en:
Tom is a thirty nine year old married man living in Masindi-Uganda. He is responsible for taking care of three children and two attend school. He operates a salon offering both male and female services. He has been in business since 2006 having started with an aim of getting income to cater for the family needs. He does farming whereby he grows crops like maize, rice and others for sell and this helped him in supplementing his incomes.

He dreams of constructing a commercial house. Competition has been a great challenge in his business plus insufficient equipment to give all services desired by his customers. He needs a loan to buy a salon drier and television to serve and entertain his customers.

loans.use: to buy a salon drier and television.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Ella es una señora casada, de ocupación enfermera en un hospital de especialidades. Sufre de desprendimiento de la retina por lo que le urge someterse a una cirugía debido al riesgo que tiene de perder la vista de forma irreversible. Ella padece de una enfermedad crónica. Su trabajo se ha visto afectado por este padecimiento por lo que la situación económica de su familia se complica ya que ella es el único sustento.
texts.en:
She is a married woman, a nurse by occupation, and works in a specialist hospital. She suffers from a detached retina, so she is being encouraged to get surgery, due to the risk of losing her vision permanently.

Her illness is chronic, and her work has been affected by it. The family's financial situation is becoming difficult, as she is the sole support.

loans.use: to obtain eye treatment

loans.name: Amparo Del Carmen

texts.es:
Amparo es una mujer de sesenta años de edad, con muchas energías para trabajar y salir adelante, desde hace unos años, gracias a la ayuda de su único hijo, monto un negocio de venta de ropa, zapatos y juguetes. Con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado hacer prosperar su pequeña tienda.
Esta temporada es clave para el negocio de Amparo, por eso ha solicitado un préstamo que le permita invertir en la compra de juguetes y ropa para niños, dado que su clientela demanda mucho estos productos. En un futuro ella planea mejorar la infraestructura de su local, además de incursionar en otros negocios.
texts.en:
Amparo is a 60 year old woman with a lot of drive to work and move forward. A few years ago, thanks to the help of her only son, she started a business selling clothes, shoes, and toys.  With a lot of effort she has been able to make her small shop prosper. 

This season is key for Amparo's business, so she has requested a loan that permits her to invest in purchasing toys and children's clothing, since her clientele has a high demand for these products.  In the future she plans to improve the infrastructure of her shop, as well as try other businesses.

loans.use: to buy toys and children's clothes

loans.name: Luz Edilma

texts.es:
Siempre con una sonrisa dibujada en su rostro, sale todos los días la señora Luz Edilma, no solo a cultivar el café, a cultivar sueños, esperanzas, su negocio es el medio de sostenimiento de su familia conformada por su pareja y sus dos hijos de 14 y 5 años los cuales ama con todo su corazón y espera brindarles un excelente futuro.
Luz Edilma quiere solicitar un préstamo para aumentar el número de palos de café, con el dinero comprara semillas de café, abonos, venenos e invertirá una parte en limpiar y preparar el terreno para el cultivo.
texts.en:
Ms. Luz Edilma always goes out every day with a smile visible on her face, not only to grow coffee, but to grow dreams and hopes. Her business is her family's means of sustenance. Her family is made up of her partner and her 2 children of 5 and 14 years, who she loves with all her heart and whom she hopes to offer an excellent future.

Luz Edilma wants to request a loan to increase the number of coffee plants. With the money, she will buy coffee seeds, fertilizers, and poisons, and will invest a part in cleaning and preparing the plot for cultivation.

loans.use: to increase the number of coffee plants and to buy products for planting new coffee plots.

loans.name: Idris

texts.en:
Idris is a Babban Gona maize farmer. Thanks to Babban Gona’s support, Idris is thankful that days of poor yields are long gone. As a Babban Gona member, he has the opportunity to achieve yields of up to 8 Metric Tonnes of Maize per Hectare of land, 5.5 times the yield of the average Nigerian farmer. 

Traditionally, Idris would have had to sell his maize for low prices at harvest to meet his immediate cash needs such as food and clothing. With Babban Gona’s support, Idris will store the maize he harvests and delay it’s sale until a date later in the season when he can obtain a significantly higher price for his maize at a premium up to 37% more than the harvest price. 

With the opportunity to earn up to $2000 per Hectare of land, Idris now has the opportunity to actualize his dream to grow his agriculture business for himself and family members and would like to use this additional income to buy maize grinding machines.

loans.use: to buy food and clothing, eliminating pressure to sell maize for low prices at harvest

loans.name: Laurance

texts.en: Laurance is a 58-year-old divorced lady who lives in an officially registered poverty pocket zone. Six years ago, she got employed to cover her needs and expenses. She is an independent lady who is responsible for her living. Laurance's salary is limited and its not enough to cover any additional expenses, that's why she is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to help her father in buying a car to use as a taxi for a source of income. Laurance hopes to stay capable of living in a descent living conditions.

loans.use: to help her father in buying a car to use as a taxi for a source of income.

loans.name: God's Hand 2 Group

texts.en:
The "God's hand group" is a newly found group in the township of chorkor, it comprises of five hard working women who sell, beef, hair products, maize, oil, materials and charcoal.

Bernice is the leader of the group, She is a married woman and the mother of two children all in their elementary level of education. She is able to raise her family and the development of her business by the help of the husband who is civilian.

Bernice sells beef at the market place for the past 26years. Due to the experience she has in the business, she has been able to maintain numerous regular customers. She seeks a loan to renovate and expand her trade since there is a higher consumption rate at the market place.
Bernice with her counterparts will be very much grateful if their needs are met.

loans.use: to renovate and expand her butcher's trade since there is a higher consumption rate at the market place.    .

loans.name: Populares Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “POPULARES” iniciará el séptimo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal Panamericana, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Magaly es la Presidenta.
