Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de frutas, venta de pan, venta de comida, venta de ropa, servicio de transporte, venta de ropa deportivos, tienda de barrio, taller de bicicletas. 

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Magaly es integrante, ella indica que hace siete años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una amiga que es cliente de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de costura y venta de chompas; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió trabajando como costurera y con la ayuda de su cuñada decidió emprender su propio taller de costura hace más de cuatro años.

 El crédito que ahora sacará será para el aumento de capital (compra de tela por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente, a la elaboración, lo comercializara en su puesto de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella vive es casada y tiene dos hijos.   

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el área de salud  y la otorgación de créditos que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The C.A. [communal association] “POPULARES” [Populars] will start its seventh cycle in Pro Mujer [Pro Woman], as part of the Panamerican Central Focus and is composed of 8 members and is led by a board of directors where Mrs. Magaly is the President. The businesses that the communal association carry out are varied and among them include: the sale of fruit, the sale of bread, the sale of clothing, transport service, the sale of athletic wear, a neighborhood store, bicycle repair shop. 

The loan they will receive will benefit small micro enterprises where Mrs. Magaly is a member. She points out that it's been seven years since she's been a member of Pro Mujer, joining through a friend’s invitation who is a client of the institution. She currently has a seamstressing and sweater selling business. She makes it known that she learned this business working as a seamstress and with her niece’s help she decided to start her own seamstressing shop more than four years ago. 

The loan that they will receive will be for increasing capital (purchase of wholesale fabric) that she’ll acquire from the wholesale sellers of the city of El Alto, and subsequently after the production, she will sell it in her sales stand. This type of work allows her to generate resources to economically support her family since she is married with two kids. 

When she is asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she responds that she likes the health area and the awarding of loans that the institution offers.

loans.use: To buy fabric wholesale

loans.name: Dilnoza

texts.en:
Dilnoza was born in 1993 year. She is single and she lives with her parents. Dilnoza is very hardworking woman. She has own business deal more than 6 years. Dilnoza sews national Tajik mattress “kurpacha” and women clothes and her clients are glad for her services.

Dilnoza is going to buy a new sewing machine and in this way to increase working capital. She is asking for a loan of 4000 Somoni with this aim. She dreams to open her own sewing business. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine to increase her working capital.

loans.name: Channy

texts.en:
Channay, a Village chief over 20 years, lives in Mean Chhey Village with husband and 1 child. She and her husband (both in the picture, standing in front of their house) both work for the government. Channay's daughter works as factory worker in a near by area while her husband works as government bank officer.

Both Channay and husband needs energy to brighten their house at night in order to work on paper work. However, she is facing some problems related to home energy. Her house has no reliable energy source. She has to go to charge a car battery every 2 or 3 days for daily usage. Sometime because of busyness she doesn’t have time to charge the battery, so the whole family is in pitch black condition for the whole day.

Therefore, she is applying for a Kiva loan to buy a high quality home solar energy. After using solar home energy, she believes her family condition would be better and safer. She also can save time and money on utilities.

loans.use: to pay for a solar home system.

location.town: Mean Chhey Village, Kouk Banteay Commune, Rolea Pe

loans.name: Erik Geronimo

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal LAS MERCEDES DE KATAÑIRAY.
El socio Erik continua dedicándose  a ejercer su trabajo como  mecanico,el socio lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, él socio es una persona responsable y espera con su trabajo poder obtener más ganancias para de esta forma continuar apoyando a su familia.
El socio solicita el crédito para comprar víveres como arroz, azúcar entre otros para su hogar.
El socio se siente agradecido por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank "Las Mercedes de Katañiray."

The member Erik continues to earn a living practicing his work as a mechanic. The member spends a good time at his business, which is doing well thanks to the determination he applies to his business every day. The member is a responsible person and he hopes that with his work he can obtain more profits in order to continue supporting his family in this way.

The member requests a loan to buy supplies such as corn and sugar, among others, for his household.

The member feels grateful for the awarded loan and he promises to pay off his set payments.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as rice and sugar, among others, for his household.

loans.name: Frank

texts.es: Frank es un joven que recientemente sufrió un accidente en su vehículo, si bien no sufrió lesiones, necesita realizar las reparaciones necesarias en su vehículo. Para esto solicita un préstamo de mil dólares ($1,000), para poder comprar las piezas y pagar la mano de obra de dicho arreglo. Con esto podrá garantizar las condiciones apropiadas para seguir movilizándose  en su vehículo.
texts.en:
Frank is a youth who recently suffered an accident in his car. It is good he did not suffer injuries, but he needs to carry out necessary repairs on his car.

For this, he requests a loan of $1,000 to be able to buy parts and pay the labor costs he has arranged. With this, he will be able to guarantee the appropriate conditions to continue move himself in his car.

loans.use: to buy parts for repairs of a personal vehicle.

loans.name: Reinaldo

texts.es:
Reinaldo es un joven de 23 años de edad, una persona que heredo de sus padres la pasión por el campo, el amor propio a la agricultura y desde que era niño tenía muy claro que este sería el medio de sostenimiento para él y sus seres amados.
Reinaldo es una persona independiente, que inicio su negocio por gusto y vocación al trabajo independiente, con su ahorros iba comprando insumos y plantando sus terrenos y hoy en día agradece al cielo las oportunidades que ha tenido para progresar y tener sus terrenos.
Con el firme propósito de seguir por una senda de progreso, de tener sostenibilidad del negocio, ampliar su cultivo y llevar al hogar mejores ganancias, quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de insumos para el sostenimiento de sus cultivos tales como venenos, abonos, compra de alambres para cercar los terrenos y pago de jornales.
texts.en:
Reinaldo is a 23-year-old youth. He is a person who inherited from his parents a passion for the land and his own love for agriculture. Since he was a boy, he was very clear that this would be the means of support for him and his loved ones.

Reinaldo is an independent person who started his business for pleasure and a calling to independent work. With his savings, he was buying supplies and planting his plots and today he is thankful to the heavens for the opportunities he has had to progress and own his plots.

With the steady purpose of continuing on a path of progress, having business sustainability, increasing his crops, and bringing home better profits, he wants to request a loan to purchase supplies for the maintenance of his crops, such as: poisons, fertilizers, buying wires to fence the plots, and day laborer payments.

loans.use: to buy supplies for the maintenance of his crops.

loans.name: Twashitse Group

texts.fr:
Donatien  fait partie du groupe  Twashitse et  habite à  Gitega. Il a 42 ans et est marié à Daphrose ,une cultivatrice. Ensemble ils ont 3 enfants âgés de 7 à 12 ans,tous étudient. 

Il fait le commerce de  riz, haricot...,dans sa boutique   depuis  2 ans. 

C’est son premier   crédit  à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu'il obtient, il  va  augmenter son capital et acheter  une grande quantité de riz et  de haricot à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, il voudrait  acheter des lopins de terre et voir ses enfants étudier.
texts.en: Donatien is a member of the Twashitse group and lives in Gitega. He is 42 years old and married to Daphrose, a farmer. Together they have 3 children aged from 7 to 12, all in school. He has been selling rice and beans in his shop for 2 years. It's his first loan from Turame. With the KIVA loan that he gets, he is going to increase his means and buy a large quantity of rice and beans to re-sell in order to earn more. In the next few years, he would like to buy some pieces of land and see his children study.

loans.use: he is going increase his means and buy a large quantity of rice and beans to re-sell in order to earn more.

loans.name: Robinson Alexander

texts.es:
Robinson es un hombre soltero de 34 años de edad, que se dedica a la agricultura y que se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para la compra de abonos, venenos, químicos, semillas de ají y pago de jornales.
Inicio en el mundo de la agricultura persiguiendo sus sueños de comprar vivienda propia, quiere brindar confort y estabilidad a su familia que tanto lo ha apoyado a lo largo de su vida y es precisamente esa su principal motivación para levantarse cada día a trabajar, su familia, sus seres amados, el deseo de verlos progresar y que jamás pasen necesidad.
texts.en:
Robinson is a single man of 34 who farms, and is requesting a loan to buy manures, pest control agents, other chemicals, ají pepper seeds, and to pay day laborers.

He began in the world of agriculture in pursuit of his dream of buying his own home. He wants to provide comfort and stability to his family, who have helped him so much throughout his life, and are his main motivation for getting up each day to work–his family, his loved ones, the desire to see them move forward in life, and to ensure that they never experience privation.

loans.use: to buy manures, pest control agents, other chemicals and ají pepper seeds, and to pay day laborers.

loans.name: Vyaragarutse Group

texts.fr:
Thérence  fait partie du groupe  Vyaragarutse et  habite à  Gitega. Il 29 ans et est marié à Gloria,une cultivatrice. Ensemble ils ont 2 enfants âgés de 3 à 5 ans. 

il fait le commerce de  riz, de haricot,...dans sa boutique  depuis  7 ans. 

C’est son premier   crédit  à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il obtient, il  va  augmenter son capital et acheter  une grande quantité de riz et de haricot à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, il voudrait ses enfants étudier.
texts.en: Thérence is a part of the group Vyaragarutse and lives in Gitega. He is 29 years old and married to Gloria, a farmer. Together they have 2 children aged from 3 to 5 years old. He has been selling rice and beans in his shop for 7 years. It's his first loan from Turame. With the KIVA loan that is getting, he is going to increase his means and buy a large quantity of rice and beans to re-sell in order to earn more. In the coming years, he would like his children to go to school.

loans.use: to increase his means and to buy a large quantity of rice and beans to re-sell in order to earn more.

loans.name: Mariela Sabina

texts.es:
Mariela es una mujer de 44 años de edad, una persona luchadora, emprendedora que logro la independencia económica gracias a que inicio hace algunos años el cultivo de plátano y ahora pelea por mantener esos terrenos que formo con tanto esfuerzo y largas jornadas laborales.
 Mariela es madre de dos hijos, tiene como principal objetivo sostener su trabajo y mejorar su vivienda.
Mariela quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de insumos agrícolas para el sostenimiento de su cultivo, principalmente abonos.
Dicho préstamo ayudara a tener una cosecha abundante y productos de excelente calidad.
texts.en:
Mariela is a 44-year-old woman. She is a hard-working, entrepreneurial person who achieved economic independence thanks to the plantain cultivation she began a few years ago. Now she is fighting for the maintenance of those plots she formed with so much effort and long working hours.

Mariela is the mother of 2 children. She has a principal goal of supporting her work and improving her life.

Mariela wants to request a loan for purchasing agricultural supplies for the maintenance of her crops, mainly fertilizers.

The aforementioned loan will help her have an abundant harvest and excellent quality yields.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies for the maintenance of her crops.

loans.name: Adjovi  Vicentia

texts.fr: Adjovi est une veuve femme  avec deux enfants à charge. Adjovi est âgée de 43 ans et vit à Adidogomé où elle exerce son activité de restauratrice  de la pâte bandée « kom » faite à base du maïs. Adjovi s’approvisionne du nécessaire servant à la préparation une fois par mois au marché et le revend à la devanture de son domicile. Adjovi sollicite ce crédit pour commander des sacs de maïs, des boîtes de sardines et des dizaines de poissons frits afin de bien revendre puis gagner plus de bénéfices et de venir en aide à ses enfants en améliorant leurs conditions de vie quotidiennes.
texts.en: Adjovi is a widow with two dependent children. Adjovi is 43 years old and lives in Adidogomé where she works in her restaurant business, selling folded pastry "kom" made with corn. Adjovi gets her necessary supplies used for the food preparation once a month at the market and re-sells them at the front window of her home. Adjovi asks for this loan to order bags of corn, tins of sardines and dozens of fried fish in order to re-sell well and also make more profits and to help her children by improving their daily living conditions.

loans.use: to buy 2 bags of corn, 20 tins of sardines and 10 dozens of fried fish.

loans.name: Beatriz

texts.en:
Beatriz is 58 years old and married with nine children, one of whom is in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Beatriz has a general store business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 13,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to purchase more stock of groceries to sell.

Beatriz has been in this business for ten years. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Leticia

texts.es:
Leticia con 28 años de edad , vive en casa familiar,junto a sus padres, en el distrito de Santo Tomás,provincia de Cutervo,departamento de Cajamarca,país Perú. Ella cuenta con muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales por parte los moradores de la zona. Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura y crianza de animales.

Leticia se dedica a la agricultura,al cultivo de cafeto, de la variedad Catimor,sembrando 2 hectáreas de cafeto de su propiedad,su predio se ubica en el caserío El Pueblo lo hizo del Distrito Santo Tomas de Cutervo, se dedica a la agricultura hace 8 años y hace 4 años cultiva cafeto. Adicionalmente se dedica a la cría y venta de animales menores y cultivo de productos de pan llevar, cuenta con mucha experiencia en el rubro.El destino del crédito será para invertir en el mantenimiento de su cultivo. De esta manera obtendrá buen rendimiento y mayores ingresos para así poder mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.

Leticia es socio recurrente para Edpyme Alternativa.Firmará con cónyuge.
texts.en:
Leticia, 28 years old, lives in a family home with her parents in the Santo Tomas district, Cutervo province, Cajamarca region in Peru. She has very good personal and work references from the residents of the area. The majority of the residents in this town make a living from agriculture and raising animals.

Leticia makes a living from agriculture, growing a variety of coffee tree called Catimor which she plants in two acres she owns. Her property is in the El Pueblo hamlet of the Santo Tomas district in Cutervo. She has been making a living from agriculture for the past 8 years and has been growing coffee tree for 4 years. In addition, she raises and sells small animals and grows basic food crops; she is very experience in this field.  The purpose of the loan will be to invest in the maintenance of her crop. This way, she will get a good yield and greater income so that she will be able to improve her own and her family's quality of life.

Leticia is a recurrent partner of Edpyme. She will sign with her spouse.

loans.use: to invest in the maintenance of her crop.

loans.name: M. Nazir

texts.en:
M. Nazir is a 49-year-old energetic man living with his family in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. He has been running a dairy farm for five years and generating income for his family. He sells milk to retailers and to the people of his community. He gets milk two times a day and his wife and daughters produce cheese, yogurt and butter from milk. With the addition of these products he earns sufficient income to run a house.

This time he wants to buy an additional buffalo so he can generate additional income to build a new cowshed for cattle because the old cowshed is in very poor condition. He does not have enough cash in hand to maintain the cowshed and fodder to feed his cattle.

Therefore, M. Nazir requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan so that he can buy an additional buffalo and can easily continue his business. With the profit amount he will build a cowshed so he can keep his herd safe. He has to maximize his savings as well so that he can easily fulfill his responsibilities regarding his family. He thanks Kiva and field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy an additional buffalo for maximizing milk production and savings.

loans.name: Jenifer

texts.en:
Jenifer is a married woman with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 34 years old and has three children still in school.

Jenifer has a fishing business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 5,000 loan amount through GDMPC to buy more materials for her fishing boat.

Jenifer has been in this business for five years. She would like to save enough money to provide for a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy materials for her fishing boat.

loans.name: Huong

texts.en: Huong is 44 years old, married and has three children, two of whom are schooling. She works very hard to feed and educate her children. She would like to improve her family’s living standards, especially for her children, but there is a lack of capital. The loan can help her to build a sanitary latrine and she will be able to repay the loan from her small business.

loans.use: to build a latrine to improve the health of her family.

loans.name: Emilio Alberto

texts.es:
Emilio es un productor agropecuario de 54 años de edad, un hombre que gusta del trabajo independiente y que cuenta con 15 años de experiencia en la cría y venta de ganado bovino y porcino.
Se caracteriza por ser una persona responsable, honrada y leal, un padre de familia honesto, tiene dos muchachos de 17 y 11 años de edad, su familia la termina de conformar su pareja con la que vive en unión libre.
El sueño de este empresario es poder generar los recursos suficiente para pagar la educación de sus niños, un sueño que convertirá en realidad pues pagara la educación de sus muchachos a toda costa, eso sí, solo por medios honestos y legales.
El señor Emilio quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de alimento de engorde para el ganado porcino y bovino, pensando en  tener sus animales en óptimas condiciones para la temporada navideña.
texts.en:
Emilio is a 54 year old farmer. He likes independent work and has 15 years of experience raising and selling cattle and pigs.

He is characterized as a responsible and loyal person of integrity, an honest family man. He has two children aged 11 and 17, and the rest of his family is the companion with whom he lives.

This small businessman's dream is to be able to generate sufficient resources to pay for the education of his children, a dream he will achieve because he will pay for his children's education at any cost, as long as the means to do so are honest and legal.

Mr. Emilio desires to request a loan for the purchase of feed to fatten his pork and cattle livestock, planning to have the animals in optimum condition for the Christmas season.

loans.use: to buy feed for fattening porcine and bovine livestock.

loans.name: Bibiana Maria

texts.es:
Abrir su primer local, genera empleo, tener sostenibilidad de su negocio, son los propósitos que ña señora Bibiana se ha trazado, y cree firmemente en poder lograrlos, ella es dueña de un humilde negocio de venta de alimentos, los cuales elabora en la cocina de su vivienda que tiene alquilada, su sueño es tener un local propio, precisamente un restaurante, casa propia, pero debe trabajar mucho para lograr sus objetivos.
Bibiana se siente feliz y motivada por los resultados que ha estado obteniendo en su profesión y es que para ella es mucha motivación saber que el motivo por el cual no crece es la falta de capital para tener mayor almacenamiento y comprar insumos, pero todo eso puede cambiar ya que actualmente se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para la compra de un congelador, cambiar sus implementos, fogón industrial y surtido de víveres y abarrotes, una inversión que dará un impulso gigante a su profesión.
texts.en:
To open her first store, to create jobs, and to have sustainability in her business are the goal that la señora Bibiana has set, and she firmly believes in being able to achieve them.  She is the owner of humble business selling food, which she makes in the kitchen in her house that she rents.  Her dream is to have her own place, a restaurant, and her own house; but she must work a lot to achieve her objectives.

Bibiana is happy and motivated by the results that she has had in her profession.  And for her, it is a lot of motivation to know that the reason why she doesn't grow is due to the lack of capital to have better storage and to buy supplies.  But all this can change since now she is requesting a loan to buy a freezer, upgrade her utensils, to buy an industrial store and a supply of food and groceries, an investment that will give a huge boost to her profession.

loans.use: To buy a freezer, upgrade kitchen utensils, and an industrial stove.

loans.name: Naudith Esther

texts.es:
Ella es Naudith es una mujer de 30 años de edad que se dedica a la impresión masiva en papel químico, una actividad que inicio hace varios años y la cual le ha servido de apoyo económico aún ante la ausencia de su exesposo, pues se separó de este quedando como madre cabeza de familia. 
Ella es Madre de un pequeño de 7 años de edad, el cual ama con todo su corazón, su principal objetivo es verlo crecer en un ambiente sano, verlo sonreír y formarse como persona a base de buena educación, un sueño que está cumpliendo día a día, pues su muchacho es feliz y muy inteligente, pero otro de sus principales sueños es comprar una vivienda propia para vivir tranquilamente con la persona que más ama, su hijo.
La temporada de fin de año es la más productiva para ella, tiene gran volumen de trabajo pero escasea de insumos, por ello solicita un préstamo para comprar papel químico en grandes cantidades, la inversión será de un total de $5’000.000
texts.en:
She is Naudith.  She is a 30 year old woman who works mass printing on chemical paper, a job that she started a few years ago and it has served her as financial support even in the absence of her ex husband.  She separated from him leaving her as head of the family.  

She is a mother a little boy who is 7 years old whom she loves with all her heart.  Her main objective is to watch him grow up in a healthy environment, watch him smile, and to become a person based on good education, a dream that she is fulfilling day by day.  Her son is happy and very intelligent.  But another one of her main dreams is to buy her own house to live calmly with the person that she loves the most, her son.  

The end of the year season is the most productive for her.  She has a big volume of work but few supplies.  That is why she is requesting a loan to buy chemical paper in large amounts.  The loan will be a total of $5,000,000 COP.


\

loans.use: To buy chemical paper in enormous quantities.

loans.name: Lorenor

texts.en:
Lorenor is a hardworking female entrepreneur with one child.

She has a rice retailing business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy more stock of rice to sell. She industriously earns additional income through other business ventures like food vending.

Lorenor dreams that one day, she will be able to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stock of rice to sell.

loans.name: Stella

texts.en:
Stella is 23 years old, married with two children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Stella has a fish vending business in the Philippines, and has been in this business for five years. Stella requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy more seafood to sell. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more seafood to sell.

loans.name: Dalma

texts.es:
Dalma es de ciudad del este, ella es hija única Trabaja como vendedora de ropas para solventar sus estudios en la carrera de diseño de moda, su mayor deseo es trabajar de forma independiente y formar su propia empresa de moda y además realizar posgrados en el futuro.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en: Dalma is from Ciudad del Este. She is an only child and works as a clothing merchant to cover her studies in Fashion Design. Her biggest wish is to work independently and create her own fashion business, as well as doing postgraduate work in the future. She is asking for this loan to be able to pay for her university fees and this way she can continue with her studies as she has been doing.

loans.use: to pay for university fees.

loans.name: Mónica

texts.es:
Mónica vive actualmente con sus padres en ciudad del este, ellos siempre la han apoyado en sus estudios, su mayor deseo es trabajar de forma independiente y ser una buena ingeniera ambiental.
Mónica está poniendo su mayor esfuerzo para cumplir con sus metas.
Pide este préstamo para poder cubrir sus gastos de titulación, y de esa forma pagar ese gasto grande que tiene.
texts.en: Mónica currently lives with her parents in Ciudad del Este. They have always supported her in her studies. Her biggest wish is to work independently and to be a good environmental engineer. Mónica is giving her best effort to meet her goals. She is asking for this loan to be able to cover her certification costs and pay for this large expense that she has.

loans.use: to pay for certification costs.

loans.name: Patrick

texts.en:
Patrick used the previous loan to buy a new vehicle to expand his transportation business. He drives a taxi and sells pigs and goats. He has been in the taxi business for 12 years now, having started it with the hope of earning an income.

Patrick does not regret starting this business because the proceeds have helped him buy land to construct rentals, educate his children and look after his family well. His future prospects are to construct a good residential house although he is limited by inadequate capital. Patrick has asked for another loan to help him buy cement and sand for constructing this rental home.

loans.use: to buy cement and sand for constructing a rental home.

loans.name: Thanh

texts.en:
Thanh is a 35-year-old hardworking woman. She lives with her husband and one child.

This loan will help her build a sanitation latrine, which will contribute to improving the health of her family as well as protecting the environment.

Animal husbandry and fishing are her family's main sources of income. She is able to repay the loan on a monthly basis from the chicken raising activity and from sales of the fish that her husband catches.

loans.use: to build a latrine to improve the health of her family.

loans.name: Mercy Marianela

texts.es:
Marinéala de 21 años de edad, de estado civil sotera, tiene dos hijos, Andrea de 4 años y Jordán de dos años, Marinéala  vive con sus padres a quien les ayuda económicamente. Ella es una mujer que trabaja en la crianza y venta de pollos, sin horario alguno, ella se dedica a este trabajo muy duro que requiere de mucha dedicación y esfuerzo hace 4 años atrás. El dinero que genera esta actividad es su único ingreso.
Marinéala solicita el crédito para la compra de mas pollos, así su negocio aumentara y por ende sus ganancias
texts.en: Marinéala is 21-years old, single and has two children: 4-year old Andrea and 2-year old Jordán. Marinéala lives with her parents and helps them out economically. She is a woman who works raising and selling chickens, without a certain schedule. She has been doing this very hard work that requires a lot of dedication and effort for 4 years. The money that she gets from this job is her only income. Marinéala is requesting a loan to buy more chickens, so her business will grow along with her earnings.

loans.use: to buy and sell chickens.

loans.name: Abdul Latif

texts.en:
Abdul Latif is a 39-year-old married man. He lives in the rural area of Lahore, Pakistan with his spouse and seven children.

He has been involved in the milk-selling business since childhood. He learned all the techniques for milk production from his father. This is the only source of income for the family; he has to devote all of his time and energy to his dairy farm alone.

He delivers milk to the market and door-to-door as well. He uses his bicycle to make deliveries, loading milk cans and delivering early in the morning. His customers like the fresh and delicious milk he delivers.

His monthly savings have dropped due to rapid increase in the household expenses; the excess utility bills, school fees, uniforms and expensive books highly impact his savings. He wants to buy an additional buffalo so that he can cope with the household expenses. However, it is difficult due to financial constraints.

Abdul Latif plans to purchase one more buffalo to increase his milk production, so that he can generate more income and savings as well. He has requested a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan. He hopes to provide quality education for his children and to buy a motorbike to deliver the milk. He is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy a buffalo to increase milk production.

loans.name: Margit

texts.es:
La socia Margit es una socia responsable y emprendedora, ella se dedica a su negocio de proveer material de construcción a los municipios. Con este negocio saca adelante a su familia.
La socia tiene 32 años y dos hijos que dependen de ella, su deseo es salir adelante ampliando su negocio, por eso la socia solicito el préstamo para comprar fierro y cemento.
Margit está muy contenta por el préstamo, ya que le ayudara mucho para conseguir sus metas, y agradece a los inversionistas de KIVA por confiar en ella. Por eso se compromete a pagar puntualmente sus cuotas acordadas.
texts.en:
The borrower Margit is responsible and enterprising. She is dedicated to her business of providing constructing materials to the municipalities. She is bringing up her family through this business.

She is 32 years old and has two children depending on her. Her desire is to get ahead by expanding her business so she is applying for a loan to buy iron and cement.

Margit is very happy about the loan. It will be a big help toward achieving her goals. She is thankful to the Kiva investors for having confidence in her and therefore she is committed to making her payments according to the agreed upon plan.

loans.use: to buy iron and cement for her business

loans.name: Edwin Wladimir

texts.es:
Edwin de 23 años de edad, de estado civil soltero vive con sus padres a quien les ayuda económicamente. El es un hombre que trabaja en la agricultura, sin horario alguno, el se dedica a este trabajo muy duro que requiere de mucha dedicación y esfuerzo hace 5 años atrás. El dinero que genera esta actividad es su único ingreso.
Edwin solicita el crédito para la compra de abono, así sus sembríos no se dañaran y podrá sacarlos al mercado.
texts.en:
Edwin is 23 years old, single, and lives with his parents, whom he helps financially. He works in agriculture without any set schedule. He has been making a living for five years at this very hard work that requires a lot of dedication and effort. The money that he earns at this job is his only source of income.

Edwin is requesting a loan to buy fertilizer so that his crops won't suffer damage and he will be able to sell them at the market.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Mona

texts.en: Mona is a 19-year-old married Lebanese woman living with her husband and two children. Her husband provides the income source to meet the family's needs and improve their lifestyle. As for Mona, she does not work but rather focuses on her family members .Today, she is in need of a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l. to pay her children's school fees. This will make her very happy as she will able to ensure a suitable education and a brilliant future for them.

loans.use: to pay school fees for her children.

loans.name: Shumaila

texts.en:
Shumaila is a 32-year-old married woman who lives with her three children in Lahore, Pakistan. She has run a beauty salon for about four years. She offers many services to her customers, such as makeup, hair styling and facials.

Due to her great service, she has become very well known on her street. In order to meet the increasing demands of her customers, she is interested in buying a larger variety of cosmetics products. However, she only has a small amount of cash, so she contacted BRAC Pakistan and applied for a loan. She wants to buy hair care products, skin products, and bleaching and whitening creams in large quantities.

Shumaila is hopeful that in time she can cater to more customers. She expects a boost in her earnings due to her loan, and she plans to spend a part of her profits on her family. She thanks Kiva and field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy hair care products, skin products, and bleaching and whitening creams for her beauty salon.

loans.name: Kely Sara Day

texts.es:
La socia Kely pertenece al banco “virgen Asunta”, ella tiene 28 años , se dedica  vender artesanía en el centro histórico del Cusco.
La socia tiene las ganas y el deseo es sacar adelante a sus dos pequeños hijos, por eso ella solicito el préstamo para comprar chompas, chalinas, guantes y chullos. Para así poder ofrecer mejores y más productos a los turistas.
Ella es muy responsable y trabajadora por eso se compromete a pagar puntualmente su cuotas establecidas, y agradece a los inversionista de KIVA  por confiar en ella y ayudarla a conseguir sus metas.
texts.en: Kelly is a member of the "Virgen Asunta" bank. She is 28 years old, she sells handicrafts in historic downtown in Cuzco. She has the desire and wants to help her two children get ahead, thus she asked for a loan to buy sweaters, scarves, gloves and hats. She wants to offer a better and larger selection of products to the turists. She is very responsible and hard working. That is why she has committed to pay her monthly installments on time. She is thankful to the members of KIVA for their trust and for helping her achieve her goals.

loans.use: To buy sweaters, scarves, gloves and hats.

loans.name: Nguyen

texts.en: Mrs. Nguyen is a hard-working 47-year-old married woman with one child. Her family mainly earns income from fishing. She would like to take out this loan to build a latrine, which will help to improve her family's health. With support from her husband, she will be able to repay the loan monthly.

loans.use: to build a latrine to improve her family's health.

loans.name: Sandra Azucena

texts.es:
Sandra  es una mujer trabajadora de 50 años de edad, solo estudió hasta séptimo grado, es madre soltera y solo 3 hijos viven con ella a quienes manda a la escuela haciendo todo su esfuerzo.

Sandra se dedica a la ganadería  desde  hace aproximadamente 15 años, este negocio lo aprendió con su tío, sus hijos son quienes le ayudan a realizar el trabajo en sus tiempos libres o cuando regresan de estudiar, esta es la única actividad productiva a la que se dedica Sandra y su familia, el ganado lo tiene en su casa lo cual es una ventaja para ella.


Sandra  utilizará el préstamo para comprar 2 novillas, pues es una oportunidad que se le ha presentado comprarlos a buen precio.

Sandra siempre ha soñado comprar pequeño pick -up para poder transportar el alimento del ganado.
texts.en:
Sandra is a 50 year old hardworking woman. She went to school only up to seventh grade. She is a single mother and she lives with 3 of her children who she is putting through school with a lot of effort. .

Sandra's been working in livestock breeding since approximately 15 years. She learned this business from her uncle. Her children help out in their free time and also after school. This is the only activity done by Sandra and her family to generate income. She keeps the livestock in her home, which is an advantage for her.

Sandra will use the loan to buy 2 heifers since she has been given an opportunity to acquire them at a very good price.

Sandra has always dreamed of buying a small pick -up truck to transport the food for her livestock.

loans.use: buy 2 heifers.

loans.name: Akouwavi

texts.fr: Agée de 30 ans et mère de trois enfants, Akouwavi est une femme mariée qui vie à Adidogomé. Akouwavi frit des poissons qu’elle revend en parcourant les quartiers environnant. Dans le souci d’accroitre son commerce et de maximiser son profit, Akouwavi revend aussi des pagnes et se rend une fois par semaine au marché puis sollicite ce prêt pour commander des cartons de poissons congelés, des litres d’huile et des pièces de pagnes afin de faire usage du bénéfice qui en résultera pour inscrire tous ses enfants dans des écoles de haut niveau et prendre en charge certaines dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
Akouwavi is 30 years old, married, and the mother of three children. She lives in Adidogomé and works frying fish and selling them as she travels around the surrounding neighborhoods.

With the goal of increasing her business and maximizing her profits, Akouwavi also sells pagnes [bright, colorful fabric] once a week at the market.

She is seeking this loan to order boxes of frozen fish, oil, and lengths of pagnes. She will use the earnings that result to enroll her children in high-quality schools and to take care of certain daily expenses.

loans.use: to buy four boxes of frozen fish, five liters of oil, and six lengths of pagnes [bright, colorful fabric].

loans.name: Eya

texts.fr: Eya est une femme âgée de 34 ans qui vit à Adidogomé. Mariée et mère de deux enfants, Eya est une marchande de produits alimentaires qui s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au marché et le revend à la devanture de son domicile. Eya désire ce crédit pour financer son achat des paniers de tomates fraîches, des bols de piments vert de la farine de manioc en vue de bien revendre puis d’en tirer profit et gagner plus de revenus afin de mieux contribuer aux charges de la famille.
texts.en:
Eya s 34 years old and lives in Adidogomé. She is married and the mother of two children. She works selling food products, which she procures twice a month from a market and resells from the front of her home.

Eya is seeking this loan to finance a purchase of fresh tomatoes, green chilies, and cassava flour. Her goal is to make good resales and earn more profit and revenue, which will contribute to better taking care of her family's expenses.

loans.use: to buy six trays of fresh tomatoes, 30 bowls of green chilies, and 60 bowls of cassava flour.

loans.name: Manuel De Jesus

texts.es: La vivienda de Manuel es muy humilde y está hecha de bajareque y el piso es de tierra, él siempre está buscando la manera de mejorarla, y en ella vive junto a su hija de 26 años de edad a la que ha logrado sacar adelante con mucho esfuerzo. Él se dedica a la fontanería desde hace 6 años, anteriormente prestaba sus servicios de jornalero y es así como ha logrado salir adelante. Manuel sabiendo las condiciones de su vivienda ha decidido solicitar un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, arena, grava y mano de obra para encementar el piso de su vivienda y de esta manera mejorar su vivienda poco a poco.
texts.en: Manuel’s house is very humble and is made from wattle and daub and it has a dirt floor. He is always looking for ways to improve it. He lives there together with his 26 year old daughter who he has managed to bring up through a lot of effort. He has been working in plumbing for six years. Previously he provided his services as a day laborer and this is how he has gotten ahead. Manuel is aware of the condition of his house and has decided to ask for a loan through FUSAI in order to invest in: cement, sand, gravel, and labor for putting in the cement for his home thereby improving his housing little by little.

loans.use: to invest in: cement, sand, gravel, and labor to put a cement floor in his home

loans.name: Akossiwa

texts.fr: Akossiwa est une femme mariée avec un seul enfant à charge. Akossiwa est âgée de 31 ans et vit à Adidogomé où elle exerce son activité de restauratrice de riz, de la pâte bandée « Akpan », foufou et autres. Akossiwa s’approvisionne du nécessaire servant à la préparation une seule fois par mois au marché et le revend sous un appartement à la devanture de son domicile. Akossiwa sollicite ce crédit pour commander des bols de maïs, des calebasses d’ignames, des kilo de riz et des tas de condiments en vue de bien revendre puis de gagner plus de bénéfices et de venir en aide à son mari aux besoins de la famille et d’améliorer les conditions de vie quotidiennes de leur enfant.
texts.en:
Akossiwa is a married woman with one child under her care. She is 31 years old and lives in Adidogomé where she works preparing and selling rice, pâte bandée [a sort of polenta] called “akpan," foufou [a yam-based dough], and other dishes.

Akossiwa procures the necessary ingredients once a month from a market, and she makes her resales from a kiosk in front of her home.

She is seeking this loan to make an order of corn, yams, rice, and condiments, so that she can increase her resales and earn more profits. These profits will go towards helping her husband with the family's needs and improving their child's everyday living conditions.

loans.use: to buy 60 bowls of corn, 2 gourds of yams, 25 kilograms of rice, and five bunches of condiments.

loans.name: Séraphine

texts.fr: Mariée et  âgée de 38 ans, Séraphine est une femme qui vit à Adidogomè avec cinq enfants à charge. Séraphine est une revendeuse des oignons et de tomates fraîches qui s’approvisionnent deux fois par mois au marché et le revend en en se baladant dans les quartiers environnant. Vue les besoins de sa clientèle, Séraphine sollicite ce crédit pour commander des sacs d’oignons et des paniers de tomates fraîches en vue de satisfaire aux demandes de ses clients et gagner plus de profit suite à une bonne vente; ce qui pourra l’aider à mieux épargner afin d’aider son mari dans les dépenses du foyer puis soutenir l’éducation scolaire de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Séraphine is 38 years old, married, and lives in Adidogomè with five dependent children. She works selling onions and fresh tomatoes that she procures twice a month from the market and resells as she travels around the surrounding neighborhoods.

Séraphine is seeking this loan to make an order for sacs of onions and trays of fresh tomatoes, with the goal of satisfying her customers' needs and earning more profits from good resales.

These earnings will help her to better save and help her husband with the household's expenses and their children's schooling.

loans.use: to buy one sac of onions and five trays of fresh tomatoes.

loans.name: Amassan

texts.fr: Mère de six enfants, Amassan est une veuve femme  âgée de 61 ans habitant à Adidogomé. Amassan est une marchande de beignets fait à base du haricot et de la farine de manioc. Amassan revend son aliment au bord de la route à la devanture de son domicile. Amassan s’approvisionne quatre fois par mois au marché du nécessaire pour sa préparation et désire ce prêt pour réaliser ses achats des bols du haricot, de farine de manioc et du piment afin de mieux satisfaire aux attentes des clients puis de gagner en retour une marge bénéficiaire assez importante pour inscrire ses enfants dans des écoles de haut niveau puis prendre en charge certaines dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
A mother of six children, Amassan is 61 years old, a widow, and lives in Adidogomé. She works selling beignets made from beans and cassava flour from the side of the road in front of her home.

Amassan procures her ingredients four times a month and is seeking this loan to finance a purchase of beans, cassava flour, and chilies.

Her goal is to better satisfy her customers' needs and earn enough profits to send her children to high-quality schools and take care of some of the daily expenses.

loans.use: to buy 50 bowls of beans, 20 bowls of cassava flour, and 4 bowls of chilies.

loans.name: Cathérine

texts.fr: Agée de 29 ans, Cathérine est une femme mariée et mère de deux enfants. Pour exercer ses activités, Cathérine vit à Adidogomé et vend des plats, bassines et marmites à la devanture de son domicile et en circulant les quartiers environnant pour gagner son revenu. Cathérine s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au marché et désire ce crédit pour commander des dizaines de marmites et des unités de sceaux en vue de bien revendre et trouver un gain nécessaire pour aider son mari dans l’éducation scolaire de ses enfants et avoir un épanouissement.
texts.en:
Cathérine is 29 years old, married, and the mother of two children. She lives in Adidogomé and works and earns a living by selling plates, buckets, and pots from the front of her home and by traveling around to the surrounding areas.

Cathérine procures her stock twice a month from the surrounding market, and she is seeking this loan to make an order of dozens of pots and buckets.

Her goal is to resell more and earn enough to help her husband with their children's education and development.

loans.use: to buy 20 units of pots and 7 units of buckets.

loans.name: Jose Jeiner

texts.es:
José Jeiner con 34 años de edad, vive en casa familiar,en casa de material rústico, junto a sus padres y hermano mayor, en el distrito de Santo Tomás,provincia de Cutervo,departamento de Cajamarca,país Perú.El cuenta con muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales por parte de los moradores de la zona.Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura,comercio y ganadería.

José Jeiner se dedica a la agricultura,especificamente al cultivo de café, contando a la fecha con 1 hectárea, de variedad Catimor resistente a enfermedades y plagas, plantación esta en segundo y tercer año de producción, cultivo de café lo realiza en el Caserio de Miraflores distrito de Santo Tomas , actividad la realiza hace 10 años. Adicionalmente se dedica al cultivo de productos de pan llevar (yuca, plátano, vituca) siendo estos últimos para su consumo y en ocaciones para la venta,también trabaja como peón agrícola en mismo caserío y caseríos aledaños. El destino del crédito será para mantenimiento y cultivo de 1 hectárea de café en producción, así asegurando una buena producción para campaña 2016, reflejado en un mayor volumen de ventas y por ende obtendrá mayores ingresos para así poder mejorar su calidad de vida.

José Jeiner es socio nuevo para Edpyme Alternativa. Firmará sólo.
texts.en:
José Jeiner is 34 years old. He lives with his parents and his older brother in his family home made out of rustic materials, in the district of Santo Tomás, in Cutervo province, Cajamarca department in Perú. He has very good personal and work references from the neighbors of the area. People in this town work mainly in agriculture, commerce and stock breeding.

José Jeiner works in agriculture, specifically in coffee farming. He currently has 1 hectare of the Catimor variety which is resistant to diseases and plagues. His plantation is in its second and third year of production. He's been growing his coffee in the village of Miraflores, district of Santo Tomas for the last 10 years. In addition to the coffee, he also grows basic food crops (yucca, plantain, taro) for personal consumption and, sometimes, also to sell. He also works as a hired hand for agriculture in his village and other neighboring villages.

He plans to use the loan for maintenance and farming of 1 hectare of coffee crops to guarantee a good production for the 2016 harvest. He hopes to get a higher volume of sells and, in turn, more income to improve his quality of life.

José Jeiner is a new member of Edpyme Alternativa. He will sign individually.

loans.use: for maintenance and farming of 1 hectare of coffee crops to guarantee a good production for the 2016 harvest.

loans.name: José Manuel

texts.es: José Manuel, tiene la edad  de 36 años, está casado,  vive con su esposa, la cual su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de fertilizantes y otros productos para aplicarle al cultivo de café y así que tenga un buen desarrollo, además pagar mano de obra para la aplicación de los productos y asistencia de la plantación una vez que tenga desarrollo de su cosecha, y de esta manera asegurarse de realizar un buen trabajo. Lo que pretende es aprovechar las buenas condiciones de clima y suelo que cuenta la zona para este cultivo, y también poner en práctica la experiencia de varios años en el manejo del café. Además de poder comprar los mejores productos y de mejor calidad para que su plantación tenga un buen desarrollo y sanidad al igual que una cosecha adecuada, y tener a corto plazo una producción importante. Con el ingreso de la cosecha que espera obtener quiere utilizarla en el bienestar de su familia y cumplir con algunas metas familiares y seguir invirtiendo más en los cultivos. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
José Manuel is 36 years old. He is married and lives with his wife who is his main priority. He intends to use the loan to buy fertilizer and other products to apply to his coffee crops so that they grow well. He also wants to pay the laborers for applying the products and for their assistance developing his harvest in order to ensure that the work is done well.

He intends to take advantage of the good climate and soil conditions in the crop area and also to put into practice the several years of experience he has in coffee management. Besides being able to buy the best products of best quality for his plantation he can have good and healthy development while having a sufficient crop. Having a short-term production is important.

He plans to use the earnings from the harvest for the wellbeing of his family and to achieve some family goals and continue investing more in his crops. This is his first loan through FUDECOSUR. He has not had other loans from state banks but FUDECOSUR has offered easier terms with a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to pay laborers to assist him in applying fertilizer and other products he plans to buy for his coffee crop

loans.name: Wendingounda Group

texts.fr: Antine, est une femme âgée de 55 ans mariée mère de 7 enfants tous scolarisé. Elle exerce son activité depuis 10 ans. Ce qui fait marcher son activité c'est le respect de la clientèle son travail bien, son dynamisme, elle tient toujours son lieu de commerce très propre. Elle veut le prêt pour acheter du mil à 225 000 f, du levure 1500, des calebasse à 8 000 f, de bidons à 18 000 f, du bois 30 000 f pour la préparation du dolo, la natte et le hangars à 42 500 f pour bien aménager son lieu d'activité. L'utilité du prêt c'est de s'approvisionner en matière première et bien préparer son dolo afin de renforcer son activité. Elle a déjà reçu le prêt 3 fois et à rembourser aux dates prévues.
texts.en:
Antine is 55 years old, married, and the mother of seven children, who all attend school. She has worked ten years making dolo [a type of beer made from millet].

She has been successful, because of the respect of her customers, her hard work and dynamism, and the cleanliness of her place of business.

Antine wants this loan to buy millet for 225,000 francs CFA, yeast for 1,500 francs CFA, gourds for 8,000 francs CFA, drums for 18,000 francs CFA, and wood for 30,000 francs CFA so that she can prepare the dolo. She also is seeking 42,500 francs CFA to buy mats and a shed to better organize her place of business.

She will use the loan to procure ingredients so that she can make dolo and increase her business.

Antine has already received three loans, and she has repaid them all on time.

loans.use: to buy millet, yeast, gourds, drums, wood, mats, and a shed.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for dental treatment.

loans.name: José Francisco

texts.es:
José, de 31 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, pero sabe leer porque asistió a unas clases en la comunidad, a los 18 años de edad se casó y tiene tres hijos, su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos.

José, se dedica a trabajar con ganado pues es coralero desde hace un año, antes se dedicaba solo a la agricultura, pero como no tiene propiedades propias tenía que alquilar y debido al problema de la sequía perdió sus cultivos; fue por eso que decidió dedicarse solo al cuidado de ganado.

José, necesita el préstamo para comprar una ternera, porque el patrón donde trabaja le ha dado la oportunidad de que compre ganado y lo mantenga en sus terrenos.

José, sueña con que sus hijos estudien y se preparen académicamente.
texts.en:
Jose is 31 years old, and did not have the opportunity to study but he knows how to read because he attended some community classes. At 18 years of age he got married and now has 3 children, his wife earns a living carrying out domestic chores. 

Jose works with livestock since he has been a coco grower for one year. Before this he earned a living solely from agriculture, but because he doesn't have his own land he had to rent and due to the drought he lost his harvests, this is why he decided to dedicate himself just to livestock.

Jose needs the loan to buy a calf, because the boss where he works has given him the opportunity to buy a calf and look after it on his land. 

Jose's dream is that his children will study and prepare themselves academically.

loans.use: to buy a calf

loans.name: Rosaline

texts.fr: Veuve et mère de quatre enfants, Rosaline est une femme âgée de 56 ans résidant à Adidogomé. Rosaline est une marchande de produits d’alimentations générales qui s’approvisionne de ses marchandises une fois par mois au marché et le revend dans sa propre boutique à domicile. Rosaline sollicite ce prêt pour commander des sacs de sucre, des bidons d’huile et des paniers de tomates fraîches en vue de stocker une plus grande quantité de marchandises puis maximiser son profit afin d’aider ses enfants dans leur éducation scolaire et à prendre en charge certaines dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
Rosaline is 56 years old, a widow, and the mother of four children. She lives in Adidogomé where she works selling general food products that she procures once a month from the market. She makes her resales from her own shop at her home.

Rosaline is seeking this loan to make an order for trays of fresh tomatoes, drums of oil, and sacs of sugar. Her goal is to increase her stock which will maximize her profits, so that she can help her children in their education and take care of certain daily expenses.

loans.use: to buy 12 trays of fresh tomatoes, four drums of oil, and four sacs of sugar.

loans.name: Yaneth De Jesus

texts.es:
Yaneth es una mujer de 35 años de edad, una mujer poli funcional de gran gusto por el trabajo honesto, tiene un negocio de miscelánea donde vende mercancía variada como artículos decorativos, accesorios, empaques entre otros, pero alterna esta profesión con la venta de alimentos, principalmente de panadería.
Vive en unión libre con su pareja, tiene dos pequeños la mayor de 8, y el menor de 15 meses, los ama con todas las fuerzas y espera brindarles un futuro próspero y lleno de oportunidades para que se formen como profesionales y puedan tener mayor posibilidad de triunfar en la vida.
La venta de alimentos ha estado en constante crecimiento, esto es algo que quiere aprovechar y potenciar, por ello solicita un préstamo para la compra de insumos para la elaboración de panes y un horno de panadería, su pensado es producir en masa para reducir gastos.
Su gran sueño es tener sostenibilidad de su negocio, mejorar las condiciones de vivienda y jamás dejar que su familia pase necesidades.
texts.en:
Yaneth is a 35 year old woman, she is a multi functional woman and is well liked for her honest work. She has a business where she sells miscellaneous merchandise such as decorative items, accessories, and packaging amongst other things. But she alternates between this profession and the sale of food, mainly bakery goods. 

She lives with her partner and they have two young children of 8 years of age and the youngest is 15 months. They love them with all their hearts and hope to be able to provide them with a future full of opportunities so that they can become professionals and have the best chance to succeed in life. 

Selling food has been constantly growing, this is something she wants to take advantage of and improve which is why she is asking for a loan to but supplies to produce bread in a bakery oven, she is thinking of producing in mass in order to reduce costs. 

Her big dream is to stabilise her business, to improve her living conditions and make sure her family never go without basic necessities.

loans.use: to buy supplies and an oven to help selling bread

loans.name: Xiomara Beatriz

texts.es:
Xiomara, de 20 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado, está soltera, no tiene hijos y vive con sus abuelos.

Xiomara, se dedica solo a los oficios domésticos, ella depende de los ingresos de sus abuelos y eso le motiva a querer estudiar una carrera corta y que le genere ingresos, es por eso que quiere estudiar un curso de cosmetología y así trabajar en su casa.

Xiomara, necesita el préstamo para pagar el curso de cosmetología, para el aprendizaje de mejores rostros femeninos, siempre le ha gustado todo lo relacionado al realce de la belleza femenina.

El sueño más grande de Xiomara, es tener una sala de belleza en su casa, porque la población es grande y no existe alguien que haga este trabajo.
texts.en:
Xiomara, age 20, went to school through the ninth grade. She is single and has no children. She lives with her grandparents. Xiomara devotes herself solely to the household chores. She is dependent upon her grandparents earnings. This motivates her to want to study a short course that will generate income. That is why she wants to take a cosmetology course and work in her house in this way.

Xiomara needs the loan to pay for the cosmetology course in order to learn how to improve women's looks. She has always liked everything having to do with enhancing women's beauty.

Xiomara's greatest dream is to have a beauty salon at her house. There is a large population, and no one does this work.

loans.use: to pay for a cosmetology course.

loans.name: Dzidudou

texts.fr: Célibataire et sans enfant, Dzidudoui est un homme âgé de 25 ans qui vit à Adidogomé. Dzidudou est un tailleur brodeur qui confectionne des habits à ses clients dans son propre atelier de couture à son domicile et vend aussi les articles de mercerie. Pour s’approvisionner de ses articles pour la confection et la revente, Dzidudou se rend trois fois par mois au marché. Dzidudou demande ce prêt pour commander des cartons de fil et des rouleaux de vaselinés en vue de gagner un gain et pouvoir subvenir à ses propres besoins quotidiens.
texts.en:
Dzidudoui is 25 years old, single, and has no children. He lives in Adidogomé where he works as a tailor. He makes custom-made clothing from his own workshop at his home. He also sells haberdashery.

Dzidudoui procures the goods he needs to make his clothing and sales from the market three times a month.

Dzidudoui is seeking this loan to make an order for boxes of thread and oiled spools, with the goal of earning enough so that he can take care of his everyday needs.

loans.use: to buy two boxes of thread and two oiled spools.

loans.name: Dagoberto Rafael

texts.es:
Dagoberto, un hombre de 57 años de edad, una persona trabajadora, honrada, echada para adelante, ama y valora el campo, no solo porque desde pequeño ha estado rodeado por verdes montañas sino porque el campo es el que le da el sustento para mantener su hogar, donde todos los días lo espera su esposa con el alimento que compra fruto de su esfuerzo y su dedicación.
Al preguntar al cliente cuál es su principal sueño, este respondió con una sonrisa en su rostro diciendo que quiere que sus hijos continúen la tradición familiar de agricultura, pero como aún tiene mucha fuerza y entusiasmo de trabajar, dará lo mejor de si para entregar a su descendencia un excelente cultivo.
Dagoberto quiere solicitar un préstamo para cubrir todos los gastos pertinentes al mantenimiento de su cultivo.
texts.en:
Dagoberto is a 57 year old man. He is a hardworking person. He is an honest man, pushing forward to get ahead. He loves and values the countryside. This is not just because since he was young he has been surrounded by green mountains but because the field is what gives sustenance to maintain his home where every day his wife waits with the food she buys from the fruit of his effort and dedication.

Upon asking the borrower what his main dream is, he responds with a smile on his face saying that he hopes that his children continue the family tradition of agriculture, but as he still has a lot of strength and enthusiasm for working, he will give his best to deliver his offspring an excellent crop.

Dagoberto is asking for a loan to cover all the relevant expenses to maintain his crop.

loans.use: to pay irrigation costs and to buy the necessary supplies to maintain his crops: fertilizer, pesticides, and other times

loans.name: Illampu Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “ILLAMPU” iniciará el octavo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal Panamericana, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Magnecia es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de mantas, servicio de transporte, venta de polleras (falda para mujer), venta de sombreros, venta de ropa para bebés.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Magnecia es integrante, ella indica que hace cinco años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una amiga que es cliente de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de tejido y venta de ropa para bebés; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió de su mamá y lo emprendió hace varios años. 

El crédito que ahora sacará será para el aumento de capital (compra de lana por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente, a la elaboración, lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella es casada y tiene dos hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el área de salud  y las capacitaciones que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The Illampu communal bank will begin its eighth cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Panamericana regional center. It is comprised of eight members and led by a board of directors. Magnecia is the president. The members' businesses are varied and include selling blankets, transportation service, selling skirts, selling hats, and selling baby clothes. The loan that they will take out will benefit small business owners where Magnecia is a member.

She says that she joined Pro Mujer five years ago by invitation from a friend who is a client of the institution. She currently has a business knitting and selling baby clothes. She says that she learned this business from her mother, and she undertook it several years ago. The loan that she will now take out will be to increase capital (to buy wool wholesale). She will get the wool from the wholesale vendors in the city of El Alto. After making the clothes, she will sell them at her sales space. This way of working allows her to generate financial resources to support her family. She is married and has two children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she answered that she likes the health services and the training that the institution offers.

loans.use: to buy wool wholesale.

loans.name: Yaovi

texts.fr: Agée de 31 ans et père de deux enfants, Yaovi est un homme marié qui vit à Adidogomé. Yaovi a une charcuterie dans laquelle il exerce son activité en revendant de la viande du porc sous un hangar au bord de la route. Dans le souci d’accroitre son commerce et de maximiser son profit, Yaovi se rend quatre fois par mois au marché et sollicite ce crédit pour commander des unités de porc en vue de bien vendre afin de faire usage du bénéfice qui en résultera pour inscrire ses enfants dans des écoles de bonnes qualités.
texts.en:
Yaovi is 31 years old, married, and the father of two children. He lives in Adidogomé and sells pork from a kiosk along the road.

Yaovi visits the market four times a month. With the goal of increasing his business and maximizing his profit, he is seeking this loan to make an order for pork.

He hopes to make good resales in order to earn enough to enroll his children in high quality schools.

loans.use: to buy two orders of pork.

loans.name: Comadres Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “COMADRES” iniciará el quinto ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Panamericana, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Sandra es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: tejido y venta de mantas, venta de medias, venta de salchipapa, venta de CD, venta de regalos, costura de prendas de vestir.

 El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Sandra es integrante, ella indica que hace cinco años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una vecina de la institución que es cliente de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de tejido y venta mantas; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió de su mamá y hace varios años decidió emprender su propio negocio. 

El crédito que ahora sacará será para el aumento de capital (compra de lana por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente, a la elaboración, lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella es casada y tiene dos hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gustan las reuniones de pago de su banca comunal que se realiza en la institución.
texts.en:
A.C. “COMADRES” will initiate its fifth cycle with Pro Mujer, as part of the Centro Focal de Panamericana. The group is comprised of eight members and is lead by a board of directors with Sandra as the president. The members of the communal bank have various business, such as manufacture and sales of knit blankets, sock sales, salchipapa (fried potatoes with hot dog) sales, CD sales, gift sales and dressmaking.

The loan will benefit the small businesses including Sandra's. She joined Pro Mujer five years years ago after being invited by a neighbor who is also a member. Sandra currently is in the business of manufacturing and selling knit blankets. She learned it from her mother and a few years ago she decided to start her own business.

The loan will be used to increase her capital (buy wool wholesale) which she will buy from wholesalers from the city of El Alto and, after the manufacture, she will sell the blankets in her point of sales. Her business allows her to generate income to support her family financially. She is married and has two children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she answers that she likes that the payment meetings of her communal bank are held in the institution,

loans.use: buy wool wholesale.

loans.name: Señor De Torrechayoc De Quellouno Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE TORRECHAYOC DE QUELLOUNO”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Quellouno, perteneciente a la provincia de La Convencion y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Segundina ,la socia continua con su negocio de cultivo de frutas, la socia lleva años dedicándose a su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia es una mujer emprendedora que mediante a su negocio la socia espera poder obtener mas ganancias para de esta forma continuar apoyando a su familia, la socia continua cultivando plátanos, café, mandarinas y naranjas, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
 La socia solicita le crédito para comprar semillas, abono entre otros.
Los socios en general agradecen a quienes forman parte de este sueño  y se comprometen a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The borrowers belong to the Señor de Torrechayoc de Quellouno group. This communal bank is located in the district of Quellouno, belonging to the province of La Convencion in the department of Cusco.

The borrower is Segundina. She continues to work in her business of growing fruit. She has dedicated herself to this business for years which is doing well thanks to the effort she puts in each day to her work. She is an enterprising woman that through her business hopes to be able to obtain more earnings so she can continue supporting her family. She continues growing bananas, coffee, mandarin oranges, and oranges. She wants to continue working in order to continue supporting her family.

She is asking for a loan to buy seeds, fertilizer, and more.

The membership at large is grateful to those who are a part of this dream and committed to making their payments on time.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilzer, and other items

loans.name: Dianis Esther

texts.es: Dianis de 30 años es una valerosa mujer que a pesar de estar en medio de una situación de inestabilidad a causa del desplazamiento forzoso al que estuvo sometida por grupos al margen de la ley, emprendió su propio negocio de comidas rápidas en Soledad un municipio del Atlántico con gran crecimiento poblacional.  Ella en compañía de su cónyuge e hijos se asentaron en este municipio con la esperanza de tener un nuevo comienzo y aprovecharon la cultura gastronómica del lugar para establecer una plaza de comidas típicas, empezaron ofertando fritos que son comida muy popular y sus principales clientes eran los vecinos del lugar; con el éxito que obtuvieron, ampliaron su carta de comidas en la que actualmente ofrecen: pizzas, perros, hamburguesas, salchipapas y bebidas.  Todos los días de la semana aperturan el negocio a las 5p.m. hasta las 10p.m. y como su capital no es muy amplio para abastecer a la demanda de clientes, está aplicando un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo que invertirá en la compra de pollo, carne, cerdo, queso, harina, papas, jamón entre otros. Esta inversión permitirá trabajar sin contratiempos e incrementar sus utilidades. A futuro Dianis se proyecta en un local donde sus clientes puedan estar más cómodos y motivar a muchos más para que sea su lugar preferido de comidas rápidas.
texts.en: Dianis, 30 years old, is a brave woman who, despite being in the middle of an unstable situation due to the forced displacement which she was submitted to by groups outside the law, she undertook her own fast food business in Soledad, a municipality in the Atlantic with a lot of population growth. She, with her spouse and children, settled in this municipality with the hope of having a new beginning and taking advantage of the culinary culture of the place to establish a traditional food stand. They began by offering fried foods which are a very popular food and their primary customers were neighbors in the area. With the success they had, they expanded their menu to what they currently offer: pizza, hot dogs, hamburgers, salchipapas [hot dogs with French fries] and drinks. Every day of the week, they open the business from 5 pm to 10 pm and, as they don't have a very large capital to supply the customers' demand, she is applying for a Kiva loan, her first financing through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, which she will invest in the purchase of chicken, meat, pork, cheese, flour, potatoes, ham, and more. This investment will allow her to work without delays and increase her profits. In the future, Dianis sees herself in a space where her customers can be more comfortable and to motivate many others for it to become their preferred fast food place.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of chicken, meat, pork, cheese, flour, potatoes, ham, and more.

loans.name: Luis Gonzalo

texts.es:
Luis es un hombre de 60 años de edad, que con empuje y verraquera está sacando a flote su negocio de venta de arepas. Luis es honesto, responsable, trabajador, sus arepas han logrado gran acogida entre sus vecinos y tiendas cercanas, pero este éxito se ha convertido en una dificultad puesto que no cuenta con un vehículo para hacer llegar su productos fresco a todos sus clientes, dejando de percibir recursos importantes que le ayudarían mucho en su crecimiento como empresa y en su familia.
Pensando en esta dificultad Luis quiere solicitar un préstamo para comprar una motocicleta, generaría un empleo y de paso pondría fin a sus problemas.
texts.en:
Luis is a 60-year-old man, who with drive and energy is keeping his arepa-selling business afloat. Luis is honest, responsible, hard-working, and his arepas have had a great reception from his neighbors and nearby stores, but this success has become a difficulty because he doesn't have a vehicle to bring his fresh products to all his customers, passing up significant income that would help him a lot in growing as a business and in his family.

Thinking in this difficulty, Luis wants to ask for a loan to purchase a motorcycle, he would create a job and would also put an end to his problems.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle, he will create a job and will also put an end to his problems.

loans.name: Mananandro Tahiana Onjatiana

texts.fr:
34 ans, Tahiana est mariée et son mari est comptable. Le couple a un enfant de 8 ans et il est scolarisé. 
Niveau scolaire, elle n'est pas si douée, c'est pourquoi, elle choisissait le secteur de commerce en détail, et elle trouve que diriger un magasin général est le plus convenable. Elle commençait cette activité en 2008 après avoir travaillé dans une entreprise de zone franche pendant trois ans. Elle a dû être chômée à cause de la fermeture de la zone franche due à la crise. L'objectif est de développer l'activité, renforcer le fonds de roulement, épargner davantage.
Actuellement, la famille habite dans une maison appartenant à ses beaux-parents et en effet, elle envisage de construire la sienne pour trouver son autonomie.
texts.en:
Tahiana is 34 years old and married to an accountant. The couple has one eight-year-old child who attends school.

Tahiana has not had much education, so she choose to work in retail, where she finds running a general store quite suitable.

She started this business in 2008, after having worked in a free trade zone company for three years. She had been let go from that previous work, because the company had closed due to the financial crisis.

Tahiana aims to develop her business, increase her cash flow, and save more.

Currently, the family lives in a house owned by her in-laws. She dreams of building her own house and finding her independence.

loans.use: to buy basic goods such as oil, soap, and candles, along with local goods such as dried beans and corn.

loans.name: Rosmary Del Carmen

texts.es:
Ella es Rosmary es una mujer de 61 años de edad, una persona verraca, luchadora, que ha superado muchas dificultades a lo largo de su vida.
Ella se separó de su esposo, quedando como cabeza de familia en un hogar donde la fuente principal de ingresos era su marido, pero ella demostró de lo que está hecha, montando un negocio de venta de productos de la canasta familiar, la típica tienda de barrio, con la que está generando el sustento para su familia, inicialmente su negocio le da para cubrir las deudas principales pero la idea es crecer, tener mayor surtido y mejores ventas para invertir en su hogar y familia.
Ella trabaja 15 horas diarias, es una trabaja incansable que lucha por su sueño de mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia. 
Actualmente la cliente se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para abastecer su tienda con refrescos, snacks, dulces, confites y chocolates.
texts.en:
This is Rosmary. She is a 61 year old woman who is tenacious and a fighter. She has overcome many difficulties during her life.

She separated from her husband and became the head of the family in a home where the main source of income had been her husband. She showed was she was made of, opening a business selling staple products, a typical neighborhood store. With it, she is generating support for her family. At first, her business has given her enough to cover her main debts, but the idea is to grow, have more inventory and better sales to invest in her home and her family.

She works tirelessly 15 hours a day, fighting for her dream of improving her family's standard of living.

Now she is asking fro a loan to stock her store with beverages, snacks, candies preserves and chocolates.

loans.use: to stock her store, mainly with beverages, snacks, candies, preserves and chocolates.

loans.name: Bory

texts.en:
Bory is 17 years old, a single student at a university in the city. He is from Kandal Province of Cambodia. His father is a teacher and his mother earns their main income from rice farming.
